I ētahi wā ka puta ake ngā mangō ki te poti ngau ai, ka ruirui
Kei runga te koroua ki te whakanoho i te tamaiti ihu hūpē.
Kitea iho ana kāore he tikanga tika i kō kē atu i te whakanoho tāngata ki runga ki te whenua
He pai rā te tīare o tēnā rākau - koirā i whakamahia ai hei whakakakara i ngā rā o mua.
Ka Tahakopa tēnei, ko waewae mātotoru
Ka rongo tonu koe i a ia e haere mai ana, he waewae mātotoru.
Kei te roroi i te kūmara . . . hei ō ki te taua ki Maketū
I motu taku ringa i a au e tiora ana i ngā tio.
He kākano whakauru taku whaea, nō Ngāti Whare rāua ko Ngāi Te Ōtawa.
Kua toru tau te kaitahaumu nā e ora ana i ngā werawera o taua wahine.
Ka whakapuru i tana tuarā ki te paretua.
Ārohirohi noa tō wairua i runga i aku kamo ē
Me kore ake te rī i ora ai ngā māhuri nei; ki te kore, kua kainga noatia e te hau moana.
Purutia, tāwhia kia ita
Taura nui, taura roa, taura kaha, taura toa, taura here i a Tamanuiterā, whakamaua kia mau, kia ita!
He mahi kai te kaupapa nui i te tahamoana i ngā rā o mua, hei aha te kaukau me te pāinaina.
Kaua e whakariroia ngā parirau o tō waka rererangi pepa - kāore e tika tana rere ki te pēnāhia.
He aha āu nā whakamārama mō te kupu nei?
Nōnahea i titoa ai ēnei tuhinga āu?
He poto ake āku kōrero i āu.
He momo pakitaha te tāniko me te kauko.
He kahu whai pakitaha te kaitaka me te paepaeroa.
Ko ngā mana poropiti, ko ngā mana tohunga ngā kaha o Hikapuhi, i āhei ai āna tūroro ki ngā tikanga o te kauaerunga o te Māori, ki te whakaora i ō rātau wairua, whakaū hoki i te tūmanako
E hū ana te pēpē, taihoa pea ka whakahuahua kupu.
He wahine pai taua kōtiro nei he roa ia, he wāwhatu te makawe, he kiritea; ko te tinana koia anō kei tētahi koare nei te pai, me te ngohe noa
Aua e hoatu te aho ki te tamaiti, kei whiwhi
E tautohetohe ana ngā waka rā
He whenua kura, he wahine ātaahua, he patu pounamu, he taonga nui.
Ko te toka tapu au ki Oruanga rā, ē, uhia atu ai e te rehu tai toko, hei whiu i au ki waho ki te moana
Keria te rua mō te hāngī ki te taha tonu o te pūranga kōhatu rā.
Kia tūpato kei whakakonukatia koe e rātou.
Ko te auahi anake o te pū e māngi ana i runga i te pā, me te mamaoa wai wera nei te āhua
Kaua e kai paipa i a koe e hapū ana, kei patētete te tamaiti.
Waiho ngā tatau kia huaki kia uru mai ai te hehengi.
Hei te iwa ngā toa ka huaki.
He whai peka huhua ngā rākau katoa o konei - e kore e kitea he mea hahore.
Ao ake ka hiki mai ia i Heretaunga.
Ka wāwāhia te kerengeo kia ngawhere ai.
He mea whakamine nāna ngā tohunga pūtaiao, kia pai ai tā rātou whakawhiti kōrero mō te mahana haere o te ao.
He uru māwhai ō ētahi, he uru torotika ō ētahi, he uru pūtētete anō ō ētahi.
Me āta hurihuri te poaka kua koihokatia, kia tunua ai ngā taha katoa.
Me whakapuare ō koutou hinengaro ki ngā whakaaro hou, kaua e noho whāiti ki ngā tikanga tawhito.
Kāore he kiko o te wheua poaka i mahue i a ia te tīkaro.
E mōhio ana a ia ki te tīkaro i te tika kia kore ai e ngaro i roto i ngā haupū o te hē
He kahurangi ia, he matahīapo i te iwi
He maha anō ngā iwi o konei i whakawhiti i Te Moana-o-Raukawa kia tae atu ki tērā hui.
Ka puta ki waho o te kēti, ka whakawhiti i te huarahi whānui
Kāore ō rātau mana ki te whakawhiti i te piriti i Pūniu
Kāore e akoako i a ia te wāhi mingi o te rākau.
Āmenea mai ngā rau tī kōuka e hora nei, kia kore ai te mīhini tapahi karaihe e rāoa.
E porara ana a raro o te kete, i komama ai
He kākahu kura te kākahu, he pūtiki te upoko
He mōkai pai te tori, ka noho noa iho, ka tiaki hoki i a ia anō.
E waru ngā whengu o te whiri o Raukatauri.
Kei te taha rāwhiti, te taha katau, o te Moana Pango i te mapi
Ahakoa tana hiahia oma, kīhai a tuahangata i tūrere, kei kīia ia he whiore hume.
He mea haratua te kiko ki te tūhua.
E noho tahanga ana te rua.
Ka kīia tēnā wāhi tae noa mai ki te taumanu tuatahi o te kei he pūraho
Wehea ngā papa tahatonga i ngā mea torotika.
Ka pahī atu te wai i te kōhao nā!
He kōpēpē tonu te waea konukura.
E karakia ana mai ngā tohunga i tua o te harakeke, e whakatōkere ana i ngā iwi o Wahieroa, ko te ingoa o te karakia ko Titikura
He tohunga tonu ia ki te kuru i ngā kōhatu papatahi kia ripi i te mata o te wai.
I eke ia ki runga ki tētahi mea o te tima e mānu ana i te wai, ka whakatangi i tana whio kia haere mai ngā poti ki te kohikohi i ngā tāngata e putere ana i te moana
Ka tangi te whio o te tereina rerewē, ka eke te ope Pākehā, ā hoki ana ki te tāone
Ka tangi te whio a tana rangatira, ka oma te kurī ki tua o te hiwi ki te ā mai i ngā hipi.
He rawe ki a au tērā koroua e noho mai rā i te pae.
He aha tērā e iri mai rā i te rākau?
Ka kitea mai hoki te tokorima nei e pōwhiri atu ana i runga o te kaipuke
Kaua tātou e hoki ki te kāinga hore kau he mātaitai. Āianei tātou rīria ai e ngā kaumātua
E wanawana ana ngā punua i te māeke.
I te huripokinga i te tinana, ka kitea kua muia e te whekoki.
Tērā te whetū taukapo ana
Ka pūpā koe, e Hine, ki te kaha rawa tō inu.
Kia tika tō whakairi i tō tarau hou kia kore ai e kāwhewhe.
He pai ia ki te nānā i te tūroro - he manawanui, he hūmārika hoki.
Potapota noa te waka i te tai
Tēnā koa whakawetoa te mīhini hoihoi nā - kei te moe te pēpē.
'Kāti, e mea atu ana au ki a kōrua, me mutu te hoihoi i roto i tō tātau karakia.' Mutu tonu atu te hoihoi
Tēnā ka riro i te riri nui, nāu e te atua, hei kōhurehure, tū ana ngā kōhī anake ka horo ngā kiko
Tērā e hoki mai te Māori, ā tōna wā, ki te kimi i aua mea i whiua atu e ia ki wīwī, ki wāwā. Ko te Pākehā anake i tahuri ki te pupuri i ngā kura huna, i ngā reo a ngā kaumātua
Pania tō tuarā kia kore ai e tīkākā.
Nā tautauhea, ko uaua pāpaku.
Kua whakaae ngā rūnanga katoa kia panā atu a Te Kōte, a Te Karaka. He toke rāua, he parangia hī ika nā te Kāwana
Ka pukā taku manawa i te omanga
Me āta pou atu te miraka ki ngā kapu i te tuatahi, kātahi ko te tī.
Tuhaina mai te nape o tō pītiti.
Heoi anō ka tupu hei whawhai; whawhai nei, ā tae noa ki te tomokanga o te pā o Houmaitawhiti rātou ko ana tama e Toi rāua ko Uenuku
Rapua, ka kitea. Pātukia, ka huakina ki a koutou
'Kei whea taua pukapuka?' 'Inanaka, inanaka' (me te pātuki o te ringa o Rātana ki taua pukapuka)
Kei reira pea te toka i pātukia e te taniwha i pipī mai ai ko Waikato
Ka pātukia te tuketuke, auē ana te waha.
Nā Āperahama Ringikana, Perehitini o Amerika i ngā tau kua whakahuatia ake nei, ēnei kupu nunui o te ao
Ko Whina Cooper te perehitini tuatahi o Ngā Wāhine Māori Toko i te Ora.
Ka haere ki te moana, ki te kura, ki te kaukau, ki te tāone, ki te pikitia rānei, ka haere mā runga hōiho
Ko tā ngā whatumanawa he tātari mai i ngā para o ngā toto, ka puta ngā para nei hei mimi.
Kua tekau hāora ia e whakamamae ana, e ai ki te nēhi e kore e roa ka rere mai te tamaiti.
Ka ohorere te iwi hī ika i te putanga atu o te waka taua
E huamo ana ki te tau ka ngaro.
He tangata whakawiriwiri tērā, kia kai waipiro ka kitea.
Werohia tō hūhā, takawhitiwhiti, takaoraora
Nā wai i tāpiri te rangi tuarua o te waiata nei?
Kei puta ngā rangi mihi atu ki taku ipo
Mā pirapirau, mā hanehane e hoki ai ngā painga o ngā rauropi mate ki te whenua.
Me pani te kou whāiti o te rākau piriota ki te tioka, kia tika ai te pā atu ki te pōro.
Mahue mai ana ngā purapura ora ki te tangi, ki te rānaki i te mate o tō rātou matua.
Kua oma te mātārere ki te whakaaraara i te iwi.
Ko te tihetihe te mātārere o taua rewharewha.
Ko te pakanga tēnā i marere ai ngā unahi o Takero; ka taka iho ki raro koia a Korotakataka whetū
He mea pīpī te tera me te paraire ki te hinu kia ngohe ai.
He pai te māhuri makomako hei pou tokorangi i te mea ka māmā ina maroke.
Ka piki tana parāoa, kātahi ka keria he rua pāpaku i te taha o te ahi, ka hoatu he ngoungou ki roto, ka utaina atu tana omu, he ngoungou anō ki te taupoki o te omu, ka tunu i tana parāoa.
I whakatūria he taiapa kia kore ai ngā tāngata e tata atu ki te pari kānihinihi.
Nō te hau koe e pū mai nei ki taku kiri?
Kia haere ake nei au ki te hoko ika hei mahi ika mata mā tātou.
Ko āna tamariki ka whakamā hoki; tēnā e numinumi ki te tākaro tahi me ngā tamariki a ngā hoa
Muri iho ka arahina anō ia ki te whakamātakitaki haere ki te mano o te hōia. Otirā i mārō tonu tōna tū, kore rawa ia i numinumi
Ka hia tau e whaiwhai ana i ngā hōiho, e wairuatoa tonu nei, e pōhara tonu nei.
Kotahi noa iho te pēke kūmara i īnoihia mō te ūhunga, e toru rawa  i homai e te koroua marae o rāwāhi rā.
E uka ana a raro o te pou i te one
Kia uka i mua o te mārena, kia uka i muri. Ka kino te mārena pūremu!
Ko te tūmanako, ka tipu ngā kōpura rīwai i rauwaitia.
Kua rio te pene whītau nā - kua kore he kaha o roto.
Ko te hohō nei te wāhi tāuhiuhi o mua.
Ka mutu ngā whakatau me ngā mihimihi, ka haria atu ā mātau hanga ki roto i te wharepuni ki ō mātau moenga
Ka aroha te matahoki o te mate pukupuku ki a ia.
Ka mau atu te waewae o te tītī, unuhia ana ki waho.
Unuhia atu rā te taniwha i te rua
Ki te mātāhehe noa, ka pai noa te rere o ngā wakarā, engari ki te kaha ake i tērā, ka raru.
Ka maranga ake taua nauhea rā, ka titiro atu i te haeatatanga o te whatitoka
E hika ē!
Ka ui atu te kuia rā ki a Huhuti, 'E hika, ko hea koe?'
Kua korehe katoa ngā hua i waiho kia tipu tonu i te aka.
Ā ka wāwāhia ana whakapakoko, mongamonga ana
Ka tukitukia koutou e ahau, mongamonga noa
I hangā e te kiore tana kōhanga kia āhuru ai ia i te takurua . . . Ināianei, auē! Mongamonga noa taua kōhanga
Tū tahanga ana ngā rākau rau ngahoro i te uruao.
Pōkaihia te tuaina, ka whakahoki ki te kāpata.
Ka āta pōkaitia te waea, huri noa i te kakau o te putiputi, kia tūtika ai.
He iwi takapau pōkai - kāore e noho roa ki te wāhi kotahi.
Ka pai hoki te hunga ka kārikarika kia harikoa ai te whare.
Me kī atu ki ana tāngata ringakore kia neke ki tahaki
E tū ana a Rāniera, e ngāngā ana nā te kaha o tana oma
Ka miri kau tō tātou waka i te taha o te toka
Ka kīia ngā hua a te ika he toene.
Kua roa rawa ngā tio nei ki te pouaka mātao, kua āhua kakati.
Kua rerekē haere ngā tikanga i te takanga o te wā.
Kua roa noa te ngaronga o te rā, engari nā te pā mai o te rekareka, wareware katoa te haere o te wā
E pai ana te whakautu: 'Ko wai ka hua, ko wai ka tohu!' Waiho kia haere ana, mā te wā e whakaatu ōna huanga
Tapaina ana te huinga tauira o te whare wānanga ko Ngāi Tauira.
Ko te whāinga o te ratonga he whakapai ake i te urutanga o Ngāi Māori ki te rāngai umanga
Nā te mea rā hoki he āhuatanga ērā i puta ake i ngā mahi tinana a ngāi tāua
Oho rawa ake i 'tahi rangi, mapu kau noa ana a Pōtiki ki tōna wahine ka riro
Mapu kau ana i te rongonga ko tana tama tētahi o ngā tokorua i oraiti.
Kei tana moenga e hāware ana, kaitoa te utu o te haurangi!
Ka hua atu te tangata i runga i tōna puhanga atu kua mate, nōhea i mate
Nō hea e kitea atu i te rehutai, i te rehu kamo
Pare: Kua oti anō i ngā kōtiro rā te whakapaipai tō rāua rūma? Rangi: Nōhea hoki! E warea kētia ana ki te whakapaipai i ō rāua matikuku
Wetekina ana ngā pingau, maunu ana tana kahu.
Tā koutou he mea kia tū te wanawana o te iwi nei
Kia tākiri te ata, kua korihi ngā manu.
Ko te taina e whakahohoro ana i te tuakana moeroa, kei mahue hoki rāua.
E whakataretare ana a Te Ponga kia puta ia ki mua ngangahu ai
Kua puanga noa iho te tangata, kua kore he kiko, he aha
Tēnā anō ngā rū whenua o mua i ētahi wāhi i mano tini noa ngā tāngata i mate
Ka ao, ka ao, ka awatea
Tō kiri i taitaia ki te wai ngārahu
Kāore e aurara te whatu ki wāhi kē atu
E hīnātore mai ana ngā noke whiti i ngā tahataha o te awa.
Ātaahua ana te pango, te hana o ngā makawe.
Te marama i runga rā ē
Kia āhua roa tonu ngā rauuru e oti mai ai he pare koukou.
Ki te tika te whakairi i ngā kākahu ki te raina, kāore e hūmengemenge.
Ko Papatūānuku te aorangi tuatoru mai i te rā, ko Matawhero te tuawhā.
Mārō tonu te uaua o te tangata ki te hoe, koropupū ana te wai ki te rapa o te hoe
E kīia ana he mea whakapiko he rakau tū, ka herengia te rapa o te taiaha rā ki te kāuru, ka tukua kia rere
Ka tū tana ringa i ngā ngita o te kōtimana.
E tīkaro ana i te ngita i tana raparapa.
He kōiraira kei te rēparo, he tāekaeka kei te taika.
E titiro mākutu ana te tamaiti ki te kōiraira whero i te rae o te wahine Īnia.
He mate rere te rewharewha. E rere ana te rewharewha o te tāne ki tōna wahine; o te tamaiti ki tōna hoa; o tētahi o te whānau ki ētahi
Kāore rawa e whakamahia ngā taputapu i pā ki te tangata pāria e te mate rere, ki te kore e āta horoia i te tuatahi, kei tau atu taua mate ki a koe.
Ha! Kua pau kē āna rare, kua tahuri ki te unene i ā ētahi atu.
Kātahi ka kotia taua ika; kei roto . . . ngā tāne me ngā wāhine, kei roto i te puku o taua wairangi e pūkei ana
Kua hē ngā mahi i tā tātou hēkeretari pōrahurahu.
Tē tika te waihotanga o te here, pōrahurahu tonu tana waihotanga . . . heoi waiho noa iho i te ara
Ruia taitea kia tū ko taikākā anake
Waiho atu ngā huahua ki konā, tū ai.
Tomo mai, e hine, ki roto nei tāua, ki titiro iho au taku tongarerewa, he mōtoi taniwha nō roto i te kopa
Ki te taonga o taku ngākau, taku tongarerewa.
Ka utua atu e Whitipatatō, 'Waiho, māku e tihoi noa ake i te tahora nei.' Waiho tonu iho ko Te Tihoi te ingoa o taua mānia i puta ai taua kōrero
Ka tihoi te hōiho, nāwai ā, kua whakanamunamu kau i te pae.
Kei roto i te awa wheuri
Ko te reo Wīwī te takenga mai o te kupu 'miere'.
He mea wehe anō te māra tapu, ko te matakā tērā, arā, tērā ingoa te matakā he mātāmua
Hei whakakikini noa iara; hei whakakōhukihuki noa, hei whakakōraparapa i te kanohi
Kia kaha te here i te rā ki te tira.
Ka kite ia i tētahi mea rerekē, arā, e piki haere ana te wai o te roto, ā, i kite anō hoki ia i tētahi waka mariko
Ka mōhio rāua kua riro te mauri o te kūmara, ko te mātao i waiho e ia
E rima tau e whakatō taewa ana ki tēnei māra; te āhua nei kua tau mai te mātao.
Kāti te whakatoi i a ia. Ina pukuriri ia, ka noho papa ko koe.
Kua tīmata te tari pirihimana ki te whakatōpū i ā rātou āpiha kia kitea mena ka taka tō rātou tāone i te tini me te maha, e taea rānei e rātou te pupuri i te mauri o te ture
He whānau Māori te hunga whakatū, whakahaere, pupuri i te mauri o te kura
Kātahi ka totō ake te aroha i roto
Nō te ata nei i haere ai a Te Hinahina, i hoe ai ki te titiwha kahawai
Ka haere te wahine rā ki te whakaoho i tana tamaiti e kaikaru tonu ana.
Waiho atu ki konā kaikaru ai, kua pau te hau!
Ka rutua ngā reina kia tū ai te hōiho.
Kua whango te tākakī i te pararē o te waha ki te tautoko i tana tīma.
Ko te tino whakahē a T. Renata he kore nōku i kōrero he kanohi he kanohi ki a Rātana, me te mea nei e pēnei ana ia e ngau tuarā ana au
Ko te tino take o te ngau tuarā he hae
Heoi, okeoke kau aua te nauwhea rā, ka kōrengarenga noa te hiku, me te pane, me waenganui, i te ngaunga a te patu
Kua hanga hokehoke rawa atu tō tāua koroua i te matenga o tana kuia.
Kua taitaiā anō rātou i tēnei rangi, tērā pea ka whai hua te haere ki te hī āpōpō.
Ko te hauwai te pūmotu huhua rawa atu o te ao tukupū.
Whakaahutia he aruhe ki runga ahi
Kia rongo koe i te ika e tongi ana i tō mōunu, hutia ake.
Kia tūpato i te tangata taunga ki te pīnono rawa māna.
E pīnono haere ana, e utu moni ana kia whākina mai he kōrero ki a ia
Ka hūtia ake taku aho; kua kore aku maka, kua kore taku māhē
Nau mai, e tama, ki te taiao nei, kia whakangungua koe ki te kahikātoa, ki te tūmatakuru, ki te tara ongaonga
Kia whakangungua koe ki ngā karakia a ō tīpuna, e kore koe e whara.
Waiwai ana ngā waha i te kakara e puta mai ana i te kāmuri.
He tōwāwahi tonu ōna hū, inā hoki he hōia ia.
I te ruarua te ngākau i te kore ōna i mōhio me whakapono ki a wai.
I tae mai tō reta i naoake nei, ā, kua rua rā e takoto noa ana ki taku tēpu.
He pukapuka whaihua tonu, inā te maha o ngā kōrero o roto hei ārahi i te tangata e hiahia ana ki te whakapaipai i tōna ake whare.
He mahi whaihua anō te whakarongo noa ki ngā pūkōrero me te tuhi anō i ngā kupu hou
He kura Mihinare a Te Aute, he kura Katorika a Hato Pāora.
Ka tae ki Waiōuru, ka whakawhiti ai i te koraha ki Tūrangi.
Ka kite ia i te kauae o tōna tupuna, ka tangohia e ia hei matika mōna, ka maua ki te koraha hanga ai hei matika
I haere katoa ngā tāngata ki te mimi i muri i te pikitia, koirā i pārekereke ai te wharepaku.
Ka kā Tauanui, ka roroku Ōtere
Kīhai ia i mate ohorere, ka roroku haere, nā wai ā, ka mate.
Ka kuku te tamaiti i tana manawa kia puta rawa ia i te arapoka.
Me pepa kōrahirahi kia kitea ai ngā tānga i te pepa o raro iho.
Kia whakatangatahia te whenua, ka kīia ko Nuku, ka noho hei hoa tauaro mō Rangi.
Whakarongo ake au ki te taha o te rangi, he tarawai nuku he tarawai rangi
I āta whakaingoatia te hōrere e ētahi iwi, me te tahā hoki e pupuri ana i te huahua.
Kia kaua te reo o tauiwi e waiho hei reo kōrerorero i waenganui i a rātou, engari ia me kōrero tonu i te reo o kui mā, o koro mā
Ko tana pāpā he tauiwi, nō Pāniora, ko te māmā nō Te Rarawa.
Ka turuturu iho te wai ki roto, mai i te kōwhao i te tuanui.
E manana ana te hukumaro o te tute
I tanuku taku tapuhau i a au e oma ana.
Ko te wai pāpaku te wāhi pai hei tākaro mā te tamariki nohinohi.
He wheua toroa ngā uhi, arā, te mea māna e nakonako te kiri o te tangata
He amiorangi māori te marama.
E whakaahua mai ana te amiorangi i te mata o Matawhero.
Kaua e moea te kaihau; me moe kē i te ringa raupā.
Ko ngā kaihoe pakeke ngā mea pai, ahakoa te kaha ngenge, ka mānawanawa ki te hoe tonu.
He wahine ātaahua a Ruapūtahanga, he urukehu, he kiritea, he puhi hoki nō ngā iwi o runga i a Aotea
He urukehu ngā huruhuru, i puta mai hoki i a Kahuwaero me tana whaiāipo he tūrehu
Kua kore e au te moe i te weherua o te ngākau ki te roa o tana hoa e ngaro nei ki te moana.
He rite tonu tana tope ki te tope kura i mahia ki te huru manu.
Ka pupuhi te hau, ka karekare te tai.
Ka oriori i tana ngāoriori hei whakamoe i tana pēpi.
Ka rokohina atu te pūpū e piri ana ki te pōhatu
E kore e piri te uku ki te rino
Ka piri te nuinga ki tō rātou ritenga māori
Mai ka uru atu a Te Wheoro ki te Pāremata, ka piri ia ki a Tāwhiao, riro tonu ko ia hei waha kōrero mōna ki te kāwanatanga
Ka piri rāua ko Te Paea Te Raihe, ka puta he tamāhine mā rāua
Ngā ino o Puhirau, i karangatia ai rātau ko Ngāti Puhi.
Nā te kaha rawa o tō wharo i tangi ai ia.
Kātahi nā te kōhatu niwaniwa - me te tūhua nei te rite.
Kia mōhio koe, e te tangata pūremu, e whakamana ana i te hiahia a tōu kīngi, a Hātana, kia oti tētahi mekameka hei here i a koe
Ko te pito whakamutunga o te taura punga o te kaipuke, he mekameka toru inihi te mātotoru.
E whewhera mai ana te hāte o tama whakameremere, he mekameka koura pīataata kei tana kakī.
Ka roa tonu te haumāringiringi e tāiri mai ana ki te whārua.
Mā uaua, mā manawanui ka oti te mahi.
E whitu tāra me te rima tekau hēneti te utu mō te hanawiti me te kawhe.
Kua kore te hēneti, te rua hēneti me te rima hēneti i Aotearoa ināianei.
Ka kohete rāua mō ngā whenua, nā reira tēnei riri e haere tonu nei i waenganui i ngā uri.
Whakamahia te toki mānihi mō te wāhanga whakamutunga o te taiaha, kia monemone ai te āhua.
Ka komoria te ihu o te waka ki te korokoro o te waha o Te Parata, ka rima tauare o taua waka ki roto ki te wai
Ka kawa i tō rātou whare kia noa.
Hei te 29 o ngā rā o Māehe 1901 ka kawangia te whare karakia o Te Muriwai, wāhi o Tūranganui
Ko aua pōtiki, he tohorā rata, he mōkai nāna e rua tahi
I a rāua e haere ana, ka whai tahi te kurī mōkai a Tamatekapua rāua ko te teina i ngā tokorua nei
I konei a ia e ngaio ana i te wāhi i tuki ai ngā waka, kei tūpono kitea he tohu ko wai o rāua i te hē.
Kāore e mutu te rakuraku a te kurī i te kaikainga e te keha.
Ahakoa te nui o te wāhi nei e kore te hira e uru katoa mai.
Ka noho ngā wāhine ki te kōwharawhara harakeke.
Na ko Ehau, ko tōku tuakana, he tangata pūhuruhuru, ko ahau ia he kiri maheni
Ka mate! Ka mate! Ka ora! Ka ora! Tēnei te tangata pūhuruhuru. Nāna i tiki mai whakawhiti te rā
Ngā tāweru o ngā koeke, he korowai, he rāpaki.
Ka mahi te taika ki te kumekume i tana pārurenga ki tētahi wāhi marumaru ake, kia kore ai e taea e ērā atu kararehe o te koraha.
Ka kōreparepatia ngā niu kia taea ai ngā kiko o roto.
Nāku rawa i rore atu
He ngoungoua te tangata ka kaukau i tērā wāhi kino o te awa - e hia kē ngā tāngata kua toremi i reira.
Patua iho aua mano, waiho iho ngā kōhiwi kia paea ana e te tai ki uta
Ina māhinahina katoa ngā kapua, he tohu ua.
E kōrūrū ana te whare i te haurokuroku.
Na, i tētahi rā ka haere, takoto ai te wahine rā i te riu o te waka, kia ngaro ai
He toa a Tiki ki te tākaro nei, ahakoa tōna wheto.
Ko te tangata rahi tērā o tērā motu o Aotea
Ka mau he ika ki te ngutu o te kawau, ka whātaitai te manu rā ki te horopuku i tana ika.
Ka kōkiri katoa te ope ki te patu haere i ngā mano tini
He rangi paki - e kōau ana ngā manu, e kīkī ana ngā tarakihi.
E rite ana ki te kararehe māori e koronae ana i te ahi
Kua koronae te waka ki uta
Ka tīmataria e ia tētahi kamupene mahi tahi mō ngā kaipāmu o Waiapu
I muri mai i te waipuke, ka tīmata mātau ki te tou i ngā tipu kūmara
I tīmata mai hoki te ahi i tōna rūma
Ka tīmata te hui ā te tekau karaka, ka mutu ā te toru.
Kei taka koe; e tūretireti ana te kāho
E tūretireti ana te waka i te wai, ka mataku ia ki te peke atu ki runga.
Kāore te tangata memeke rā i hiahia kia whakaahuatia ia ki te pouaka whakaata.
Kāore he tangata mōhio ake i te wānanga.
E kōtamutamu ana te waha o runga, engari anō te waha o raro.
I a au ka pātai atu e aha ana ia i te pō rā, kāore ia i whakautu mai.
Māku e whakautu tana reta.
Mā wai e whakautu tana mihi?
Ka whakautua ana kupu hahani ki te ngeri.
Kia tere te whakautu i te waea, kaua e waiho kia tangi tonu.
Heoi anō tāna hei whakautu i te pātai, ko te hī o ngā pewa.
Me aumangea tonu te tangata e taea ai e ia te kupenga te tō mai ki uta ko tōna kotahi.
Hei ngari mō ana mātua tana whakarongo ki ngā puoro hoihoi i te ao, i te pō.
He tangata turi - tika mai, hē mai, ka mau tonu ki tāna.
E pahū mai ana te puku o te tāne, o te wahine, o te tamariki i te kainga a te ahi
I pāngia anō hoki ngā tamariki e te mate e kīia nei he mare heihei
Kia āhua 100 kiromita te tawhiti mai o te kōtiritiri i te mata o te whenua, ka kore katoa.
Me āta whai haere ngā takahanga katoa o te hātepe e puta pai ai te hua e kimihia ana.
Ka whakamāramatia te hātepe e hurihia ai te pūngao o te wai hei hiko.
Kī ana taku kono i te ika me te kūmara.
E whētuki ana tana tārāuma, koirā au i mōhio ai e ora tonu ana ia.
Kia au ai taku moe, kei whakapuke tonu
He tōtara nui a Te Rangihouhiri rāua ko Tamapahore nō Ngāi Te Rangi.
Ka hūiki te whenua
He meho!
Kāti te whakapōrearea mai - kua hoia katoa ahau i ēnā mahi a koutou.
Korikori tāua, ka taka tauira
Ka whatā e te ngutu ko au anake kei te kai kino atu te aroha
He kōrero ka whatā, e hoki anō ki te waha?
Kei te totitoti te kaumātua rā nā te mea i whakahoutia tana pōrori.
Me tapatapahi ngā āporo nā kia whiwhi ai te katoa.
Kua wātea te whare ki a kōrua.
Ehara kua wātea te tāne māna
Kia wātea ka haere mai ai rātou ki te tangi
Ka taki haere ki te kari pokotea hei mahi tautau noke.
Kāore au e mōhio he aha te pūtakenga o taku tūrohea - kua roa rawa pea ki te mahi kotahi, kua hōhā.
Tino tere rawa atu te huri o te pōtaka a Rikirangi.
Kia parauri te piki, kua ngakungaku, kua pai hei kai.
Kāore te rahoraho o runga i katia, he hiahia nō Francis kia kite a ia i te pikinga mai o te wai me te taunga o te waka i rō wai
Te hua i te puku e kaimomotu nei, wairua i tahakura nōu nei, e Nuku
Ka mukua atu te pani pare tīkākā ki ōna ngutu.
Kei ngā kokonga tonu o te awa te hāpua.
He whenua tītōhea, he rākau kurutote.
Kua roa ēnei whānau e tatau ana ki a rātau anō ko wai ngā tuākana.
I kitea te kaimeke e hikoki ana i mua i tōna hinganga.
Kua mātau ia ki tā te Atua whakaakoranga
Kaua e tukua; kia kaha te pupuru, kia manawanui, kia ū; e kore a Hātana e kaha, kei te Atua te kaha
Haere, e hoa, haere ki tōu okiokitanga. Te wharemate, tēnā koutou katoa. Kia kaha, kia manawanui
E te whānau, kia manawanui. Kaua e uru ki ngā hara o te tangata kē
He tini te pekerangi hei huna i te tangata ka ngaro ki te kore rā
E paki rā te paki o Autahi
E rua iara aku ringaringa ki te whakakopa mai i taku manawa
Te whakawaiwai i ngā patu i te whare
Ka hūtia ngā otaota katoa o te māra ka makaia kia pūranga ana.
Ka whanake ki waho ki te moana, ko ērā taero hoki, arā, ko te tutu, ko te parata, ko te rātāmoko, ko te taniwha
Ko te rahi katoa o taua pānga neke paku atu i te kotahi eka
Ko te rahi o te whare i oti i a ia te whakairo katoa, e 20 putu te roa, e 12 putu te whānui
Ko tā te whakapōtaetanga, he whakapūmau, he whakanui i te ekenga o te tauira ki tētahi taumata o te ara rapu mātauranga.
Ko ngā mirumiru e tohu ana kua ī te wai huarākau nā.
Kainga ana e te kurī te paitini, mea kau ake kua hukahuka te waha.
Ka raua atu te kānga ki te kōhua wera, mea kau ake kua pahupahū.
E koutu noa ake te puke i te raorao
I mate tana tahu, e noho pouaru nei a Hine.
Kārawarawatia tō ika ka tauraki ai kia maroke
Me huri whaka-te-karaka te katiwai kia mutu ai te rere o te wai.
Ka titia atu te kōpere ki te whenua, kātahi ka tākiria te taura kia rere ai te pere.
E rua ngā wāhanga matua o te kōpiro, ko te kōpiro iti me te kōpiro nui.
Kāore e whakaaetia te ānu i te kura, he paru hoki.
Ka mau te hū ka hoki te waiora ki te ao
Ka mau te hū ki tō hengahenga
He hū kore ki tēnei mahi ki te tuku kōrero
Me hōkai tonu ina whakawhiti koe i te huarahi.
Tuarua ko te whakatuhera i taua kete, kia maringi ngā kai ki waho
Kātahi ka mauria mai he pū repo, ka taiparatia te pā, ka horo
Tēnā rehua mai te waiata i ako ai kōrua i te kura.
E pītoto wai ana te mauhere, kāore tonu e hoatu e ngā āpiha e uiui ana i a ia.
Tuhia tō rārangi ki te ruri kia kore ai e ānau.
Nō te 2 o Māehe, ka hangaia he whare pūrokuroku mōna ki runga i tētahi puke ki Te Puna, ka hikitia atu a ia ki reira. Ao ake te rā, ka mate a ia ki reira
Ko tā ngā tāhae haututū rā he haukuru i ngā wini o te whare.
He mea whawhati ngā tiakarete torutoru kia whiwhi tiakarete ai ngā tamariki katoa.
Torutoru noa iho ngā tāngata kua kite i tēnei manu, nā te mea torutoru noa iho ngā manu nei kei te toe
Ka whakawhataia he tarawhiti mai i te tuanui o te kīhini hei pae whakairinga mō ngā kōhua.
Kua pongakawatia ngā rīwai - he raihi te kai ā te pō nei.
He patapata pango ngā whakapaipai o runga i te kākahu.
E tōroherohe ana te tārere i te hau.
I te maurutanga o te haumātakataka, ka kitea kua katoha ngā momo mea katoa ki ngā wāhi katoa.
Kua mākū katoa te pera i te rerenga o te hūare i te pī o te waha.
He toretore kei te pī o te karu.
Tēnā ko te hopu a te ringa whero e kore e tāngāngā
Kua kōmahi ngā rīwai, arā kua pango a roto
Ko te take i pirau ai ōna niho, he kaha nōna ki te inu waireka i ngā rā katoa.
Kikī ana te tēpu i ngā momo kai ātaahua katoa. He mīti, he pīkaokao, he kaimoana me ngā huawhenua, huarākau, tae atu ki ngā purini me ngā waireka
Ko te ngākau e ohia ake ana ki taua mea
Me kimi he rākau hāmoremore mō ngā whakataetae mau toki.
Hoe atu ana te iwi ki te tirotiro i te kaipuke kua ū mai ki te koro.
Ko te iwi tēnei i āhukahuka mai te reo ki tō konei reo
Hāpaipai te kiato mua, ka mania, ka paheke
E kore tō mate e wawe te rautupu
Hei rautupu māna i ngā mema o te komiti, ka whakamātauria e Puna kia riro mā tana apataki rātou e turaki
He peke tōna takiri
Tēnā tīkina atu ngā kapu rā, ka horoi.
Ko wai te wahine e karanga mai rā?
Ko Kipa te ingoa o te tangata i kōrero atu rā au.
Me whakakikī ngā pihi o te nanekoti, ka tō atu ki te iāri.
Kia tai mimiti tātou haere ai ki te mahi tuangi.
Kua pūrara te taiapa i muri i taku whare, hei kuhunga mai mā te mahi a te kurī.
Kotahi hāora te poaka e whāia ana, kātahi anō ka mau.
Kia kaha tātou ki te whai i te mātauranga.
Taku tīmatanga anō ki te pakuku iho, he turaki tonu te mahi a te tangata i a au. Ko koe anake te tuatahi i totoro mai ai te ringa hei hapai ake i a au
Whakamaua ai e ngā hōia he kākahu kōingoingo kia kore ai rātou e tere kitea e te hoariri.
Tangi tō te tamaiti, whakamā tō te koeke
Ka nānātia a Haumapuhia, ka koeke
Ka kōhanatia te waka kia hoki mai ai ki uta.
I te kaha tāroa ōna, ka tahangoi noa te tū i te taha o ana hoa poto.
Hei te wā o Whiro ngā pō kengokengo.
Kapurangatia ngā otaota nā e ia
Ka karahui mai te mātinitini ki te rā whakamaharatanga ki Te Hokowhitu-a-Tū.
Ko te rangi i noho ai te Atua, ko Toi-o-ngā-rangi, arā ko Tikitiki-o -rangi
Ka moea iho e Waitiri ka kīia mai e te wahine o raro, o te rēinga, 'Aua rā te mea ka mate nā koe'
Kua tōwhero katoa ngā uma o ngā tāne i te mutunga o te haka.
Kua ngongohe ngā pikopiko i te wera o te rā.
Kātahi au ka piko ki te titiro i taku waewae ka kite au e heke ana te toto
Ka kimihia he rākau monemone hei pou mō te haki.
Na ka ekea a Rangi ki runga
Tapahia atu te wāhi puruhekaheka ka kai tonu.
Kua māngeongeo taku waewae i werohia rā e te pī.
E waru ngā tao ki a ia, ā, kīhai a Whare i rongo i te māngeongeo
Ka hauhau taku hoa i te pōro, rere tika atu ana ki te wini o te whare.
Ka rere te nehu o te tai
E mau anō ō koutou tūpare ki ō koutou māhunga
Wiri ana ngā kauae i te kōkōtonga.
I te roa ōna e tāuhiuhi ana, ka kī katoa te rūma kaukau i te koromāhu.
Totō ana te pirau i tana harehare.
Kua mōmona te kina, kua ngeangea hoki i tēnei wāhanga o te tau.
Kei te hua taku kiri i te pura whetū kai runga kai te rangi
E pura mai ana ngā pūrātoke i ngā tahataha o te kōawa.
I pau tonu i a ia tana kai - e rua pune noa iho i toe mai.
Kaua e waiho kia eke tonu ki te wā whakamōhio mai ai
Kia manawanui, kua tae tonu tātou ki uta.
Nei koa Taihakoa te muia nei e te mōkutukutu, moe papatītaha ka mokohiti ki runga
Ka haere ka mōmōhangatia te manu
I tōna matenga, ka haere ka kaingākautia āna mahi toi.
Ka piki te hēpara i te hiwi, ka whiu haere i ana hipi ki raro.
Na, kua ruha noa iho te Kīngi, i te roa o te haerenga i raro, me te ngenge i te whawhaitanga, me te taumaha o tōna wairua
Nō te kitenga i te auahi nui e puta ana i tō rātou maunga, ka pā te anoano ki te iwi.
I toto tana ihu, ā, ka puru, ka whenguwhengu, he tepe te raru.
Ka tino raru te tangata mēnā ka noho mai he tepe ki tētahi o ana iaia kawe toto.
Nā reira e mōhiotia kei te hē te murunga o ngā whenua Māori, ā, he tika nei tā rātou whawhaitanga
Kei te hē tēnei kōrero, he kōrero kūware tēnei, nō te mea he tohu te kōrero ngahau nō te iwi mātau, nō te tangata mātau
E tākare ana ahau ki te haere
Kāore au e aroha atu ki te kāeaea rā - nāna anō tana mate i kimi.
Mau ana ngā pua o te pōhutukawa i te kōrinorino.
Maene ana tērā te kai mai o te rā ki aku pokohiwi.
Kia nui hoki te tūpato ki te kutu, ki te puruhi, kei moe kino te tamaiti, kei oho, kei mate
E kīia ana e te Pākehā he puruhi te kaitītaritari i te mate kino nei i te pūponika
He taniwha horo waka, ka tirepa te waka ruanui
Kāore au e mahira ki te tangata kua tae ki ngā tōpito katoa o te ao - kāore hoki au i te paku hiahia haere ki tāwāhi.
Kia pararaki te ngau o te whao, kia kirimoko noa ai ngā whakanikoniko.
Takē kōanga; whakapiri ngahuru
Takē ana a Rangi i te wā mahi, he māngere hoki.
Kaweka ana te tangata nei; me te kahika!
I mahia anō te koneti ki te houama i te mea he māmā tērā rākau.
Kua tū te whare hei tūrutu mō ngā wāhine e tūkinotia ana e ā rātou tāne.
Me tā tāua manu e whakaarorangi haere ana, me he kāhu e tiu haere ana i ngā mānia papatairite o te motu nei
Ka kitea ki te kore pōporo, kātahi ka maharatia, 'Kei whea ngā hua o te pōporo nei?' E tirohia ana, ka kitea ki ngā tapuwae o ngā wae rākau o Tama
He matau nāhaku, i ruia mai i runga o Rangiātea, i ngā pora rā, ē, i rere mai i tawhiti

He harore rangitahi
He pai rangitahi
Ehara i te mea e kitea rangitahitia
Tēnā koa katia te kūaha - he makariri.
Katia ō karu, kia kore ai te hopi e uru atu.

He kopī rawa ēnā, waiho kia eke ki te rahi e tika ana.
Kua mahu te hiako o tōku waewae
Kua tīmata hoki te mahu haere o tōna taotū
Te putanga o taua mate ka korotiwhatiwha te kiri, whero ana, kā ana me te ahi. Ka mahu, kātahi ka ngaro te kōtiwhatiwhatanga
Ngā pāniwhaniwha ngau pūraho a Te Aotauru
I petia mai e te ngaru
E pūtohe ana ngā tamariki kia kite rātou i te arewhana.
Ka whakamatara a Rū i tana neketai, ka whewhera anō i tana hāte.
Ko Kōpū te whetūao noho tuarua mai i te rā, ko Papatūānuku te tuatoru.
He hāmama tonu te waha o te pī ina tau atu te uwha manu ki te kōhanga.
I te ngārara nei e kari ana i tōna huarahi ki roto i te kiri, ka māeneene te kiri, ka tīmata te raraku a te tamaiti
Wakuwakuhia mai te kakaru o te hue, ka tangotango ake i ngā kākano, ka whakamaroke.
E porotaitaka ana te ao, ko tōna rite kei te poi Māori
Nō te mapi te hē. He porotaitaka hoki nō te ao, he papatairite nō te mapi
Haere rā, e Tama! Auraki atu ki tō pāpā, ki a Hori, ki konā moe ai
Ko te tukorou o te whānau, kia whakahokia ia ki Te Kaha, ki reira tanumia ai.
Ka kawiti haere ngā whā o te harakeke, ka koeko.
Kua hinamoa katoa te pūwai i te tunga rākau.
Ka toromoka atu tana rākau ki te whakamātau e pēhea ana te hōhonu o te wai.
Ka toromokatia a raro o te moenga kia oma ai te kiore.
Oho ake ki te ao, mapu kau au ki taku moenga
Koia te whakarite a tō rāua kuia mō ana hanga, ko te whare ki te tuakana, ko ngā mea o roto ki te taina.
Me pūkerikeri he awakeri kia kore ai te whenua nei e kōreporepo.
He mōmona nōna ki te wai pēnā
Kaua e haria te kete tuangea, he nui rawa pea mō ō taonga torutoru noa.
E tahu ana te kai, kīhai i roa ka maoa te kai
E rua hāora te mīti e tahu ana, kātahi anō ka māoa.
E toru rā ahau e hōnea ana i taku mahi, i te mea e māuiui ana ahau.
He iwi mārohirohi, he iwi arotahi, e kore e hinga!
E pipī tonu mai ana te toto i te motu i tana waewae.
Me hume tō panekoti i a koe ka whakawhiti i te awa kia kore ai e mākū.
Na kua totoro iho te ringa o Rāwiri ki roto ki te pēke, kei te tango i tētahi kōhatu i roto, piua atu ana e ia
Piua atu ana te koromāhanga, ehara, mau pai ana te upoko o te kāwhe.
I ia Paraire te tangata haramai ai ki te tapahi i te karāhe i tōna kāinga.
Kua pūpūwai te ara i te ua. Kei tapoko noa iho tō tāua waka.
I titia hoki ki titireia
Ka titia tana māhunga ki te rau huia.
Anei te kete pai mō ō taewa.
Ko te tēpu kē te wāhi tika mō ngā pukapuka.
He aha mō runga i tō tōhi - he tīhi, he tiamu rānei?
Te rerekē noa iho o te kākahu nei - ko hea te wāhi tika mō aku ringa?
E takataka kau ana ngā māhunga, pērā i ō te hunga mātakitaki tēnehi.
Warea ana ngā āpiha ki te pahupahu, huri rawa ake, kua hora te herehere.
Anana! Tītipi ana taua waka
Ka kite ia i te whakaahua o te tangata i pororeretia rā te mātenga, ka tau mai te paipairuaki ki a ia.
I te kaha o tana kauwhau, tangi ana tētahi wahine, kotekote rawa, i tana mātaunga ake ki ōna kino, ki tōna hara nui
He mea tuapeka a Tūrongo e tana tuakana, e Whatihua.
Tōwahiwahi ana ngā karu i te kaha pōuri, kāore i roa ka rere iho ngā roimata.
Kua tōwahiwahi ngā whatu, kua rere te hūpē i te kaha makariri o te hau.
Ka rotua te whare e ngā wāhine rā, ka whakamoemoea kia moe
Ko te kai mā ngā tamariki he pūhā, he roi, he pōnaho rīwai kai poaka nei
Tokotoru ngā kaihoko whenua e taukaikai ana kia aro atu te iwi ki ā rātou tono.
Kotahi kete renga, kotahi kete pārara
Kāore te whakapaparanga e ora ana i te wā o te pakanga tuatahi o te ao i moumou i tētahi paku aha.
Tahuti mai, e te tau. Kua roa rawa tēnei ngaronga ōu!
Ka whakaraua ētahi hei apa, ko ētahi anō i patua kia mate.
Kia tae ki te marama o Whiringa-ā-rangi, kua mahana haere te whenua, kua pai te tipu o ngā kai.
Kua kōputa te kawititanga o te ringa o te tamaiti i te wai wera o te tīkera.
E tū tawhiti mai ana ngā heketua i te wharenui i ngā rā o mua.
Hinuhinu ana ngā tuna mina auahi i te hākari.
Ka kore anō e oti he mahi i te poroteke nā.
Kia maoa te tōmato kua whero.
Kia maoa ngā hua o te poroporo kua kīia he hōreto.
Ko tō koutou mana ehara i te mea whānako, he mea hou ki runga ki ō koutou tīpuna
Tēnā haramai, ka pūrongorongo i ngā āhuatanga katoa o tā koutou haere ki Haina.
Waiho māna tonu e pūrongorongo tana wikitōria.
Ka takitaki haere te tohunga i te whakapapa o ngā rākau o te ngahere māori.
Ka mau ki tana tatā, e ka ipuipu
Kua kore e taea tō rāua matimatiaone tētahi ki tētahi te huna.
Ina haere te tamaiti ki te kōhanga, ki te marae, ki hea ake rānei he tamariki anō  he tāngata anō kei reira, ka ako ia i ngā pūkenga pāpori.
He rerekē ngā raruraru pāpori i ngā whenua rawakore i ērā ka hua ake i ngā whenua whairawa.
He wā anō ka taupatupatu ngā kaupapa here pāpori ki ngā kaupapa here ohaoha.
Māu ia e whakatikatika, ina hoki, he whanaunga nōhou.
Kei te mōhio nāu i mau mai te paru ki roto; nōhou kē ngā pūtu nāna i kawe mai.
He auē tā te pā, he hurō tā te taua
Ka hoka te kāhu ki te takiwā.
Kua rongo anō koe i ngā kōrero mō tō rangatira e rere ana i te takiwā?
E kore e taea te whakarerekē ngā tikanga a te iwi i te whakatupuranga kotahi
Kua puta te karanga a ētahi rōpū me whakarerekē te kara o Aotearoa
He aparua taku tarau, he mahana te apa o roto, he pare ua tō waho.
Ka pā te tapātiu, ka paruparu ngā matapihi i te kurutai.
Ko tēnei karakia mō te tangohanga o te ariā o te tangata e hiahiatia ana kia whakamatea
He māturunga toto te ariā o te hau o Māui.
Kātahi ka huakina te tatau o te angi nuku ki te pō ki Rarohenga
Ko tōna whare, he whare kōpae
Whakapūrēhua ana te mea rā
Kīhai ia i āwhiwhi ki te ahi, he pai kē ki a ia te noho ki te kokonga.
E pātētē ana te koroua piriti i te taumaha o te taraka.
E whakapāeko kau ana, he noho tou noa iho te mahi.
Tīmata tonu atu rātou ki te parau i te whenua hei mahinga kai mā rātou
Hei tohu mai taua mapi rā i te huarahi hei whāinga māna, atu i Te Rēinga ā tae noa ki te ao wairua o te Māori i Rarohenga
Kua ngaro hoki ngā pū wānanga o raurangi, kua kore ngā whatu o te Whare Wānanga a ngā koeke, kua heke rātau i Tāhekeroa ki te muriwai hou ki Rarohenga
Ko te hunga e whāia nuitia ana i roto i ngā mahi whakatairanga i te reo Māori, ko te iwi Māori tonu ka tahi, ko te whānuitanga atu o Aotearoa, ka rua
Inā hoki he nui rawa tō whakatairanga i a koe kia rangona e te motu katoa, kia kī ai ko koe te tino tangata mōhio o te motu nei mō te Paremete
Kīhai ia i kimi ki te whakatairanga i a ia anō, i te kaupapa rānei o tana whāinga
He rākau e taupare ana i te huarahi.
He tōtiti, he taewa kōrengarenga - koirā taku tino kai.
Ka roherohea e ia ana tīkiti ki ana hoa kāore nei rātou i whiwhi.
Kāti noa te takaware - kei mahue tāua i te waka rererangi.
Ka kī atu a Kahu, 'E kore au e hoki; he tāmaki hokinga tahi tēnei mōku kia haere atu?'
Me hoatu tapanga ki ō taonga katoa ina haere koe ki te kura noho, kia kore ai e riro i tētahi atu.
Kaua e mahia te hāngī i runga i te pōnānā, kei mangungu ngā kai.
Kua ngākau kore i te kaha whēnakonako ki tana whenua tupu.
E mea ana au kia rongo ngā tāngata Māori o Heretaunga ki te tini o te hanga kei a au e tū ana. Ngā hānehi parau, me ngā kara hōiho
Whakamaua atu te tohu rēhita a te kaunihera ki te kara o te kurī.
Matoe ana te whenua i ngā kukume a Rūaumoko.
Kua whakakorehia te hui, nā te tokoiti o te hunga i hiahia whakauru mai.
Whakakorehia atu ēnā whakaaro kino.
Kei te whakakorengia tana tūranga. Koinā ia e kimi mahi nei i konei.
Me mōhio anō ki ngā pātene hei pēhi i te rorohiko hei whakakore i tētahi mahi, kia hoki pai mai ō kōrero o mua.
Me amo ake te ariki, kia kore ai ōna waewae e pā ki a Papatūānuku.
Rere pāhukahuka ana te wai i te au o te awa.
Ka tika te toki ki te uru, pakaru mai ana ngā roro.
He āhua kē tō ēnei pā kōhatu, he āhua kē tō ngā whare peipei oneone, whare ririki, kikino noa iho, o ngā tāngata tupu o te whenua
Ka whiua e te tamaiti he peipei oneone ki te māhunga o te heihei, kia mutu ai tana kai i ngā rōpere i te māra.
Kāti hā, nei rā te kāhu hāro kua whakawhenuatia, ā, kua āta tau mō e hia nei rā te roa ka hāro anō ai?
Kia kī atu mātou i konei, ko taua whenua rāhui i kōrerotia nā, kua oti anō te āta roherohe, kua tuwhaina paitia ki tērā tangata ki tērā tangata
Me uaua ka mamae te kumu i ngā whēru ngohe o ēnei rā.
He tangata ngangahau a Rāpata ki te pāmu hipi, ki te mahi tahi hoki me te kāwanatanga ki te hoepapa i ngā mate kararehe
Ka rongo i te makariri o te hau tonga i tōna taenga mai.
He tokomaha ngā Māori kua rongo i te mamae i runga i te nama. E kī ana te whakataukī Pākehā, 'Pai atu te haere matekai ki te moe, i te maranga taimaha i te nama'
Ka riro te mumu, ka riro te āwhā
Tārutua ana tērā te waka rererangi pakupaku i te mumu.
Me kuhu kākahu tino mahana te tangata piki maunga, kia kore ai ia e mate i te naku.
He mea korotutu te huahua i roto i te tahā.
He kiri mata rānei, arā, he huakuru, āhua pūwhero
He mea kaiwaenga ngā akoranga e te pūoho ahi.
Kāti, e te ao Māori, kia whakawhena, kia ngana ki te hau.
Ka whakaawhia te Pirimia e ngā kātipa kia kore ai ngā ringa o te marea e pā atu ki a ia.
Whakamataku ana te kurī tainanakia rā.
Ka kapukapu mai te ngaru
Waiho te tapahi i te karaihe mō ākengokengo - ahakoa e ua ana ināianei, aoake ka paki.
Tēnei mea, te ripa, he karakia wehe i te mate
E kōrangaranga ana te pāpā ki tana tama, he kore nō te tama e whai i ngā tohutohu, he whakaputa mōhio hoki.
Ka tohu ia i te kāinga o tana kuia i rahaki.
Ka tohu atu tana ringa ki te pūngāwerewere e huna ana i ngā kōhatu.
Pēketia mai te tarakihana hei tō atu i te poti ki uta
Ko mātou ngā mea tamariki i tonoa rā runga poti ki te moana ki te mahi kina, pāua, kōura, na, ki te hī hoki
Tēnā, e Raha, tā tāua pōkai kura, whītikitia mai kia mau te pupuri
Kei te ngahuru ka kitea ngā pōkai kuaka, e rima tekau kei ētahi pōkai, ā e tae ana ki te mano ētahi pōkai e rere katoa atu ana whaka taua wāhi nei
Ka tukua atu e ahau ngā pōkai namu ki a koe, ki ōu tāngata, ki tōu iwi, ki ōu whare
He ātaahua ake te ara āwhiowhio, engari he tere ake te ara tukutata.
Ka riro mā tana matua tonu e tapahi te tāngaengae i tana whānautanga mai.
Ka mutu ana hū te parakena, kātahi ka tuhaina, ka waku ki te papanga kia pīata ai.
Kua moke nei te āhua o tana noho, ā, noho ai ko tōna kotahi i rō tāwharau hangahanga, i tana kōpuha rānei
Ki te mea ka tohe ia kia noho i roto i te whare raupō kōpuha nei
He huru kōkōwai kei te tuarā me te tou o te tieke.
Kitea nuitia ai te kōkōwai, te pango me te mā i ngā kōwhaiwhai.
I te tauutuutu, ka hohoko ngā kaikōrero.
He rau hohoko whai kōtingotingo mā ō te ngaio.
E tata ana te hauhake tētahi rīwai, tērā e pakari a Ākuhata nei
Kaua e kainga matatia ngā huarākau nā, waiho kia pakari.
E whiua ana te kakau o te hoe
Ki te kāhore te kakau, e kore e pai te tapahi a te toki
Me ahopoka tātou kia tū hei iwi kotahi
Taukamo mai ana a ia ki a au.
Ka poua iho ngā pou whakarae hei pupuri i ngā tūwatawata, kia kore ai e hinga.
Ka herea he tuaina ki ngā poihau a ngā tamariki.
Ka aumihi te ngākau ki ngā tamariki o aua whenua kua noho pani i te mate ārai kore.
Ka hōpua te wai i te marae
Ka pāinaina ki te rā, ka mahana tētahi taha, ka huri tētahi taha
I a Āpirana e kimi kaiārahi ā-takiwā nei hei pou tokomanawa mō tana kaupapa ahu i ngā whenua Māori, i heipū tonu tana kite i te pai o Whina mō te mahi nei
Ka unu te heahea i ana kākahu, ka rere kiri kau atu ki te papa tākaro omaoma haere ai.
Ki te kāinga i tukia ai koe, i ngonga ai koe
Tae rawa ake te whaitaua, kua ngonga kē ngā hoa.
Anei, nāu kē te kutikuti nei. Nāku i tango i tō pāhi.
Nāu te parāoa nei i tunu?
Nāu te taha hūmārie, nāku te taha whawhai o tā tāua tamaiti.
Nāu i Māori ai te wairua o taua pukapuka.
Ka eke ki runga o te toka teitei, ka noho
Ka kapea te ahi ki te horehore kia whitawhita ake.
Ei, kei te kōrero au ki a koe!
Kei te haere au ki reira āpōpō.
Kei te mea atu au ki a ia me tono ia i te tūranga rā.
Kei te ora katoa tō āhua.
Kei te nui te kai i te kāpata.
Kātahi ngā kōrero harehare nāu: whakarērea atu
Ka tīmata te tangata ki te mahi tuna, kātahi anō ia ka mahi i tērā mahi, ka kā te ahi parapara, mā ngā tāne anake e kai
Ka pā ohorere te pāhoahoa ki a ia, ka hinga.
Me kōpana kē te tatau, kaua e kumea.
E whā ēnā tāngata nunui e kōpana ana i te waka kua tapoko ki te wharu, he aha te aha.
He tangata mōrohirohi tonu, e kore rawa ia e whiore hume.
Kua roa tonu ngā toa e whawhai ana, kua kōngenge.
Hei konei nā he pā mō tātou
Waiho kia tae atu tātou ki te marae. Hei reira kohia ai tā tātou koha.
Ka mate te tangata tāroaroa ki te ngunu kia kore ai tana rae e tuki ki te pare o te kūaha.
Kāore anō kia ihi te ata, e korihi ana ngā manu.
He whare rūnanga Māori te whare o taua kura, he whare haumākū a roto, he pōuri, kāore he putanga hau kia ngaro ai te pūmāhu me te mōrūruru
Āta horoia ō kēkē ki te hopi kia kore ai e mōrūruru.
Me monoa me whakamīharo tātou ngā uri ka tika ki tā rātou i mahi ai, ki tā rātou i kite ai hei painga, hei oranga mō rātou o aua wā
E rere rā te ao uru, tauhōkai ana i te hei.
Ina takohe te mahi, ka tika te mahinga mai. Ina mahia i runga i te pōāritarita, ka hē.
Kua mutu rā tana mahi, kua pai tana haere ki te hāereere i runga i te takohe.
Ka pā te karanga a te tangata whenua ki tana matua, 'Whakatika ki runga, haere i te takitū'
Ka haria ngā mokotī hei whāngai ki ngā poaka.
Kua keria ake e te kurī tana wheua kua hia wiki nei e tanu ana ki te māra.
Ka whakaekea ngā rauawa ki runga ki te matua
Ka takea mai te pēkana i te tuarā me ngā kaokao o te patopato.
Ko Tūhua te moutere, he tūhua hoki te kōhatu o reira.
Whakamahia ai te pāra tūhua hei tapahi i ngā makawe o te tamaiti, hei haehae anō i te kiri i te wā o te tangihanga.
Ka kīia anō te tūhua ko te 'karaihe puia'.
Kaua hei nanati i te kakī o tō teina, kei hemo ia i te kore hā!
Rapua he tikanga e taea ai koutou te whakahuihui, kia kotahi te whakaaro ki te rapu tikanga e taea ai te nanati i te puku o te ngāngara wheke nei
Tō mata whakarewa ki te wai ngārahu
Ko Rongomai te unahiroa i kitea i te takiwā o Taranaki maunga i waenga o te Mahuru 1882 me Poutūterangi 1883.
Tīhaea te pepa i te wāhi ngangengange.
Ka hāmama te waha o te kuia ki te whakatūpato i ngā tamariki e whakatata ana ki te ngāwhā.
Koia ka whāia te kawa, hei tauwehe i te tapu kia noa ai
Te haunga hoki o te pera o te kau.
He tapu hoki tō te hunga kua kaipāwetia?
Me oma koe me tō pākau, engari kia kaha te pupuri i te taura - kāre e roa ka rere ki te takiwā.
Ka haere te wahine ki te rama ika, ka hoki mai ki uta, ka whawhati i ngā rau otaota, ka tunu ki te ahi, kātahi ka tāpi ki ngā waewae hai whakaora i ōna waewae i te ngaunga a te kōhatu
He tangata e tū ana i te kokonga, ko ia e papare ana i ngā waka ki te ākau roa, kia kore ai e rokohanga atu ngā taraka i aituā.
Kātahi ka whakamenea e Tama tana tira, ka heke ki te tonga ki te mātakitaki whenua haere.
Kua katore mai ngā ngārahu o te ahi.
I paheke ia ka tau atu ki ana papaihore.
Ka ruha tonu ia i ngā pō o te Paraire, ka takoto noa i runga i te nohoanga roa.
I te Parairei ka kaha te hau, ka ngarungaru te moana
He moana ngarungaru, he waka tūkokikoki.
I tohutohu tuatahitia a Waitoa ki te Rongopai e te mihinare o te Rōpū Hāhi Mihinare, e Te Harawira, i tōna mīhana i Waikanae
Kātahi anō ka matika te tāhae rā, ka waha i te rūruru tahā ki te kawe wai
Whatiwhati kau ana ngā rākau mōwhakiwhaki; ko ngā rākau tāwariwari, pīoioi noa ana.
Ka rū te whenua, ka pīoioi mai te kōhua e iri mai ana ki te ahi.
Patua mai taku kupu
Ka hūtia ake e Irawaru tāna aho, ākuanei ka ārau ki tā Māui
Kei te kahekahe te kurī i te kaha wera.
Kaua e hoatu rehu patu ngārara ki ngā rōhi mēnā e whētuma ana, kei uaina.
Whakakīia te tāpu kaukau ki te mongi mahana, kia pai ai te horoi i te pēpi.
Ēhe, koia ko tana tāne hōu? Te tamariki mārika!
Ka hemo au, ka riro tēnei rākau i taku tamaiti, ka whai mai anō i te tikanga o tōna matua. Na, ka waiho tēnei rākau hei oha ki ngā uri, hei tohu mō rātou
Waiho pokerehū ana te keti kia tuwhera, ao ake, kua tipa ngā kararehe ki wīwī, ki wāwā.
Ka tāwaia te whītau kia parauri.
Kotahi ringa ki te pupuru i ngā pata, kotahi ringa ki te rui, me tīmata atu i te remu o te māra, me te rui haere ā tae noa ki te upoko
E whakangaro atu ana te remu o te ope a Rakapare ki roto o Marokopa, ka pepeke mai a Tūpāhau, kāore i roa kua piri tonu atu
Ko ngā remu o ngā rīwai hei kai mā mātou
Kei te rīroa o te whare te takuahi.
Kāore tērā whānau e haere ki te karakia, hāunga anō te mātāmua - haere ai ia i ngā Rātapu katoa.
Kei a ia anō ōna whakaaro.
He tungāne anō ōna.
Kāore he take o ōku koti - me hari kē ko tētahi o ōna.
Ka mauheretia ia mō te toru tau hei utu i tana takahi i te ture.
Ko te ture tāke te wehenga o te ture e tino tohunga ana taua rōia.
Kua tū mai te ture e kī ana he hara te kai paipa i roto i ngā whare inuinu tūmatanui.
Kāore i mau he manu tā rāua karu.
Me whakamahi he whao kua uhia ki te konutea, kia kore ai e kino i te waikura.
He konutea anō kei roto i ētahi pani ārai rā.
Panea!
Me te mea tērā ko te haka a Tānerore, e wiriwiri nei i te raumati
Ko te mea ia i tino hōkaka ai ia, ka haere ia ki a Te Whatuiāpiti hei hoa mōna
Ka nohopuku tonu a ia ahakoa te nui o te kōrero a ētehi atu.
Nōna te hōiho pango. E noho taonga tonu ana ki a ia taua hōiho.
Nōna anō tōna mate - me mutu tana mahi i runga i te pōrārā.
Kāore ia e tino paingia ana e ngā tāngata o konei, he whakahīhī nōna.
He pāmārō tonu taku puku i mua, engari kua tāoru kau i te whānau tamariki.
I tētahi kōtiro e haere ana i runga i tōna hōiho ka tae ki tētahi awa ka whakawhiti ia, ka poharu te hōiho
Me uaua ka hauhungatia te whenua i te Ōrongonui.
Ka whiua te pōro e te kōtiro ki roto i te koropewa.
Ko te wahiawa te wāhanga matua o te whenua.
Ka pūtere atu ngā manuhiri katoa ki te waha o te marae, ka tatari kia karangatia rātou e te hau kāinga.
Ka haumiria a muri o tana taringa ki te huruhuru manu kia ngōko ai ia.
Kaua e whirinaki atu ki te toupiore rā - ka eke ana ki te mura o te ahi, kua kore i kitea.
Engari anō te marama, ka eke penu tonu kei runga
Ko te toa ko Whakatau, Whakatau anake, eke! eke! eke penu! hui ē! tāiki ē!
Ū rawa atu ki uta, whekuwheku ana ngā tāngata me ngā kākahu
Kotahi, e rua rānei ngā raumoa e rere ana i waenga i ngā tānga pākati.
Ko ngā pū pea a Te Whiti i karangatia kia hunā te pari kai, kia ngaro
Tēnā te pari kai kei ōku mātua, tē hikoi atu
Ko ngā maihi ngā ringaringa o te tupuna whare e whātoro ana ki āna manuhiri.
He tiwha nui kai te rae, he mā kai te matamata o te ihu, e toru waewae mā, he raho poka, he hōiho āhua nui
Ko te tiwha parauri rā te wāhi i maringi ai taku kawhe.
He pororapa taku rākete tēnehi.
Hurihuri ai ngā waetea i te ara omaoma pororapa.
He whakatuwhera tonu rānei tāna, he wāwāhi i ngā pōkurukuru o tōna oneone?
He ngongo i ngā ringaringa, he mea mahi ki te tūpākihi, he mea ore te uho o roto kia kore
Ko te ngongo e tango ana i ngā hūare kia kore ai te tangata e rāoa i te wā e mahia ana ōna niho.
Nā whai anō i kiorere ai tō hōiho - me mutu tō whakawherewhere i a ia.
Whakahinuhinu ana te kekeno i te pueatanga ake i te wai.
Te āio e kauia e te kiore
Ko te manawa tētahi o ngā whēkau ka tino raru ki te kaha rawa te kai hinu.
Me mahi kia tūtaki rawa ngā kamo o te tūpāpaku, kia moe ōna whatu.
He wahine tū rangatira te āhua. He ngākau mākoha, he mihimihi ki ia āhua o te tangata. He puiaki ki a ia te karanga i te tangata kia peka ki tōna kāinga
Ka konihi mai te whānako, ka kōrari i taku pāhi, ka oma!
Hoatu tātou ki te tā karaka
Toki tā wahie te toki
E kī ana ia ka nui te moni kei Niu Tīreni. Kei te puhake ngā pūtea moni katoa o te motu
Ko ō mātou ngākau e puhake ana i te aroha ki a koe
Kua tuhira ki te hoki ki te wā kāinga, kua hōhā i te noho ki te tāone.
I tana takawawe, ka wareware te tango i tana wati i mua i te uru atu ki te wai.
Ka whakatika ko Tānemahuta, ka whāwhai; kīhai rawa i taea e ōna ringaringa
Ka kitea iho kua muia te tou o te hipi e te ngaro.
Muia ana te tahatika o Waipā e te ngaro i te pirautanga o ngā kai
Nā Tāne a Ranginui i toko ake.
Ka whakatūria he pou ki muri hei toko i te pātū, kia kore ai e hinga ina pupuhi te hau.
Kāore e taea e te hōiho ngā nati nā ki te kopi tonu tō ringa - me whewhera.
Ka tū au i reira, ka tuohu taku māhunga, ka kopi aku kanohi, ka inoi whakamoemiti au ki Te Atua, mōku kua tae mai ki tēnei wāhi tapu
Arā ētahi iwi o te ao he tikanga tā rātou e tapahia atu ai te tīkou o te wahine. Heoi anō, e whakahētia tēnei mahi e te nuinga o ngā iwi o te ao.
Kai whea tō rangatiratanga, tō ihi, tō mana, tō marutuna, tō maruwehi?
Kia mōhiotia ai e ngā tama a te tangata āna mahi nunui, me te korōria o te maruwehi o tōna kīngitanga
I waitohua ko ia tētahi o ngā tino tohunga, maruwehi kē nei ia o tōna wā ki te whaikōrero
Ka whakawerahia te paipa, kātahi ka āta whakapikoa kia oti mai ai he tuke.
Ka hoe ki waho ki te moana, ā, unuhia te kāremu
Kei te hau takiwā ngā momo haurehu pērā i te hāora, i te hauhā, i te hauota.
He konatu nō roto i te ngākau
Ka patua te hīnau, ka tātari, kātahi ka pokepoke ki te wai; ka karanga mai tētahi tangata, 'Kia iti te wai kia kukū ai'
Nā Hone Heke i whakahaere he uri ki Te Pēwhairangi i te tau 1844 hei whakangungu i ngā motika Māori. Nāna te pou haki a te Pākehā i Kororāreka i tope
Kei te tūroro anō ētahi motika, pērā i te whakahau kia noho tapu tonu ngā kōrero mōna.
Ko te māharahara nui, kei tae te mate urutā nei ki ngā tōpito katoa o te ao.
Haere koutou ki a Tūmatauenga, i mate mai nei koutou ki te pae o te pakanga ki te Tiamana, i mea nei kia riro i a rātau te ao katoa, ka mea ai i ngā iwi hai pononga takatakahi mā rātau
Ka rite ōu uri ki te puehu o te oneone, ka tohatoha atu koe ki te hauāuru, ki te rāwhiti, ki te raki, ki te tonga
Kotahi te kōhao o te ngira e kuhuna ai te miro mā, te miro pango, te miro whero. I muri, kia mau ki te aroha, te ture, me te whakapono
Tapahia mai kia rua ngā kōhao ki te pepa - koinei te wāhi mō ō karu.
Hāua atu ana te pōro, ehara, kotahi atu ki te kōhao.
Kei te anga te kūwaha ki te uru
Ka whāia ki te taupae o Mamaku engari nā te weriweri o te whenua ka uaua te kimi i a Te Kooti
I a māua i Ōtautahi ka haere mai taku hūngoi ki te tiaki i ana mokopuna.
Waimarie he korotiwha i te kanohi o tētahi o ngā māhanga e mōhiotia ai ko wai a wai!
Me āta tāwhe i tērā koki o te rori, he rahi hoki ngā motokā kua aituā i reira.
I te pūtahitanga o ngā ara, ka tāwhe whakatemauī.
Ko te rongo i tuku mai, i wani mai i runga o ngā maunga
Kei te whakainati i te keke kia whiwhi ai te katoa.
Waiho mā te iwi e kōrero ō painga, kaua māu.
Ka tukuna ngā pānui pōtitanga ki te iwi nui tonu.
E moe ana ahau, nā, ka kamu ko taku ringa, he tākiri, he tohu kai
E kamu noa ana te ringa o te pēpē, kāore anō kia tika te nanao atu i te taonga.
Kua matapō i ngā whiunga mākutu a tērā iwi.
Māku kē te mea pakupaku, ki a koe te mea nui ake.
Kei hea te purūma? Māku e tahitahi te whare.
Homai rā he rare māku.
Ka piki, ka eke ki runga, ka kī ia, 'Rāngaingai ana te hiwi nei'
Kua āninaninatia te māhunga ki ēnei tū kōrero
Ānō ka maea ngā motu nei, ā ka pūrero ake i te moana
E tautau mai ana ngā hua i te kāmata o te peka.
He tangata mauri tau, kāore e mataku, ka ū tonu ngā whakaaro ki te ārahi i ana tāngata e ora ai te katoa.
Ko te tangata ka mauri tau i te whakamātautau, tērā tonu e puta, ko te tangata ka mauri rere, auare ake.
Ka haere mātau kia kite i a Tākitimu, tēnei whare whakairo ātaahua, mīharo hoki kei Ruataniwha
Kei reira te minenga e whakarongo ana ki tana reo ātaahua.
He wairua ātaahua tō te tamaiti rā.
Ka riri te ika nei te kōpūtōtara, kua whāngai te tinana, kua tū mārō mai ngā tara o te tinana.
Kua whakanohoia ngā pūrepo me ngā pūteretere ki te takiwā pai o runga i aua hiwi me te whanga mai ki ngā hōia a te Ingarihi
He rangi ka maomao
Hei roto au hei taku whare rohi atu ai
Ka tūpono tana waewae ki te peha panana, makahinga tonu atu.
Pāhia tawa, pāhia pipi, ka taona āianei, āpōpō ka hukea
Me ia nei kai te uru haere te whakatakariri ki roto i ō koutou ngākau ki ēnei kōrero e takoto ake nei, tino pai tēnā
Ki te tae atu te tepetepe e mau mai ana ki tana waewae ki ana roro, tērā ia te mate ai i te ikura roro.
Tīwē ana te kurī i te mauhanga o te whiore i te kūaha.
I te hoihoi o te ihu ki te korowaru ka haere au ki tua moe ai.
He taura akuaku, me uaua ka motu.
Kei te ore kōhao mō te here o tana hei.
Inā te huhua o te mānuka e tupu ana i taua hururua.
He pai te māra tāhingahinga, mēnā e anganui ana ki te raki.
E ori ana te kōtiro i a ia e waiata ana.
E ori ana ngā māhuri i te kōkōhau.
Ko te kupu tauaro o te kupu 'runga', ko te kupu 'raro'. Ko te kupu noho tauaro ki te 'iti', ko te 'nui'.
I ngā mahi pāngarau, ko te tango te mahi tauaro o te tāpiri.
Ko te mea e tauaro ana ki te 'tapu', ko te 'noa'.
Ahakoa te aroha o tētahi ki tētahi, kia tau atu ki te papa tākaro, kua tātāwhāinga.
Ka maranga te kōmaru, kātahi ka tino pai rawa atu te koki o te waka.
Kua pou ko te pūtake ki raro, arā ko mua o te teka, tū tonu, oreore kau ana te kāhikuhiku
He kōhatu kāhuarau te pounamu.
Kāore he pōtae hei huna i ōna makawe poutihitihi.
I a au e moe ana i te taha o te awa ka rongo au i te wawaro o te reo punawaru.
Ka tae ki te pūaha, ka puta mai te ngaru ka tahuri te waka
Ko te haerenga o te waka, ā, ka tae ki te wahapū o te moana o Kāwhia, e tū ana te ngaru kore rawa te waka i puta ki te moana nui, ā, ka hoki mai anō
Ora katoa te iwi i te korita o te tūtei.
Ka makaia tana pōtiki hei whatu mō te pou tuarongo
Kia whakangaoko koe i te kauae o taku ngeru, tērā te nguru ai i te manawareka.
Ka noho ka kimi i tētahi tikanga e mate ai i a ia te hanga kiore nei. Ka puta tōna whakaaro kia tīkina he ngeru
Kua huirua i te ngau o te puku, me te mate anō i te tararē.
Ka tae tōmua atu māua, ka mau tō māua hoa e kai tonu ana.
Kaua tātou e tōmua, hei te tekau rā anō pea ka taetae atu te nuinga ki te karapu.
Kei kokotia ngā pihi tōmua e te hauhunga.
Otirā, kaore i taea engari ko te whakawhetai ia o te ngākau, nui atu
Nā reira he nui te whakawhetai ki a ia i te Wāhi Ngaro mō te hoatutanga i tēnei whakaaro mīharo ki roto i te ngākau o ō tātou koroua i te wā e nui ana te whenua ki a tātau
E whakawhetai atu ana au ki a koutou, e aku hoa Pākehā, mō ā koutou kupu whakapai mōku, mō tēnei kura hoki
Me rīrā anō te kaumoana ko tāna mahi he kohikohi i te kōmaru.
Kua horaina ki ngā taputapu tino papai, arā, ngā tēpu, ngā tūru, ngā naihi me ngā paoka
He rawe kē ki a au te kaiwhakaari mōhū - e waiho ana mā te kanohi me te tinana e kawe ōna whakaaro.
Ā rāua kōrero e kauhau nei mō Rangi rāua ko Papa
Kei reira anō e kauhau ana i ngā tikanga o te Rongopai o te rangimārie
Kei reira rāua e kauhau ana mō ngā painga o taua rongoā hou.
Kāore e mauru te māteatea i a au ki taku pōtiki kua tūrorohia nei.
Kaka ana te manawa i te pānga o te ringa o tuahangata ki a ia.
Kua tōpuni katoa i te moko
He rangi tōpuni
Ka mate te kātua ka kārangi kau ngā kūao
Kei te tauhutihuti i a rāua
Ka ringitia hoki ngā roimata e Rangi ki runga ki a Papatūānuku, ko ia te haukū
I taua wā ka takawhiwhi taku waewae katau ki taku tokotoko katau, ka pore au ki raro
Ka haere māua ki te rau matamata, ehara, kī ana tā māua pākete.
He kererū kē tērā, ehara i te tūī.
Kāore au i te haere āpōpō. Kei te haere kē au ātahirā.
He aha koe i nohopuku ai, tē kōrero kē ai i ō māharahara?
Nāna i ārai kei Paritua au, kei rangitawhiti koe
Oho ake ki te ao; kei rangitawhiti koe, nā te kamo i rehu mai
Kimihia mai he kape hei kōrorirori i te peita nei.
Ka pania te tou o te pēpē, kātahi ka whakamaua te kōrē.
E mārohirohi ana au i te roa o te ara
Pōrauraha ana ngā whakaaro o te kuia i te mea kua hurihia katoatia te takoto o ngā taonga i roto i tana whare.
Ātaahua ana ngā pūtahi i ngā kaokao o te pae maunga.
Utaina ō tarau iti ki te hōiho weweru - kāore e roa ka maroke i te hana o te ahi.
Takatakai rawa te kākahu hei pōtae
Ka takatakai i tana pungapunga kia kore ai e takoki.
He tamaiti kokoti tau, he whakapaunga aroha nā ōna mātua.
Kei te kōrero te pouako ki ngā ākonga.
Nāku i hoatu ngā āporo ki ngā tamariki.
Kua haere rātou ki Murihiku, noho ai.
Whiua ngā whēkau ika ki te wai.
Kei te whakawhirinaki atu te teina ki te tuakana.
Kotahi te wahine i noho, kotahi te wahine i whakapekapeka
Pōkia tā tātou umu
Kua puta te kupu a ētahi tohunga o te iwi Pākehā, e rua rau tau e tū mai nei ka pōkia te ao e te hukapapa
E matangurunguru ana te whānau i tō rātou maikiroa.
Whakatikaina tō rūma moe - kaua e mākoko.
Ko te reo o Rarotonga te pūnga o tā tātou kupu mō te kōkōnati, arā o te 'niu'.
Ko te takahanga o ngā kupu o te Tiriti te pūnga o te matangurunguru o te iwi Māori i ngā tau whai i muri iho.
He hōpara makaurangi te whakairo, otirā he kōrae
Ka whakatata atu a Hine, ka tū hakehakeā, ka papaki i te pāpāringa o Tame.
Nō mua i te riri i Ōrākau, ka tukuna e Tāraia he kāho paura mā Rewi Maniapoto
I te taenga atu ki te hōtēra, anā kē te nui o ngā kāho pia i hokona mai e rāua
I kitea wawetia ngā tāngata i paea ki te moutere nā te mea i te koiri tā rātou haki.
Karutaina ngā kōwhatu
Ko ngā rangatira taitamariki ariki kua whiwhi i ngā mea pai katoa, he mea hoki he uri ariki. Ka kohi nei rātou i ā rātou tahā hinu, me ngā tātua kāretu, me ngā piki toroa, me ngā remu huia, me ngā hou kōtuku
Ka karanga ki ngā matua rā, 'He kura takai puni, e kore e pakaru i a ia'
Ko ngā wāhi tamomo i te onepū e tohu ana he toheroa kei reira.
He whenua pukewai tēnei, inā rā, ka piki ana te awa, ka ngaro katoa te whenua, ka pēnei te āhua.
Kua hakituri, engari kei te eke pahikara tonu.
Me whakakōrero ngā ākonga kia pakari ai ngā reo.
Ka whakakōrerotia anō e ia, ā, kua nanu te reo
Homai he kai hai whakaputa i te ihu o mātou ko aku tamariki
Ka pau te tui te whakaeke ki te ngohi
Mā ā tāua irāmutu e whakaeke ngā utanga ki te taraka.
Ka whakahoki atu a Ngāheu, 'Ei, kia tika rā, he mā ake pea aku waewae i tō kanohi'
Ā, tōku kitenga iho i ō kupu, ka whakaaroaro au, me whakahoki rānei, kaua rānei
Riro ana mā te taiohi e whakahoki te mihi mai a te iwi kāinga.
Karekau ana whakahoki, atu i te hiki o ana pakihiwi.
Ka tautokona te tamaiti i pāria e te mate kia kore ai te mate e rere ki ana hoa.
Ko ngā rīwai i motu kei tētahi pākorokoro, ko ngā mea pai kei tētahi atu, ko ngā tīnaku kei tētahi atu.
Me pēhea e motu ai te waero o te reme i te naihi pūhuki  nei?
He tangata e mea ana ki te patu i tōna tuahine, ka mamau rāua ko taua tangata, nō reira ka werohia ia ki te naihi
Ahakoa te mea ka pā atu te tangata, ka mahue atu he maramara hau ki reira.
Ka aohia e te tangata tōna hau i te wāhi e noho ana ia kia kore ai ia e taea te mākutu.
E mōhio ana ahau kei te patu mai koe i a māua ko taku hau, e kore taku hau e riro i tō karakia
He rawe katoa ki a au ngā kai pākehā nō ngā tōpito o te ao.
Ka moa atu rāua; ko Karihi ki mua . . . ka piki rāua, ka moa
Ki te roa rawa au e takoto ana i taku taha, ka korongenge te waewae o raro.
Kua maoa ngā taewa, kua pē katoa.
Kua turi taku taringa - kua puru i te taeturi.
Kaua e paraihia te ika nā, me tunu ki te mamaha.
Tēnā koutou, e hine mā, e tama mā.
Mokohiti noa te tau o taku ate. Nuku mai, e hine, kia piri mai koe
Kei muri te kurī i ngā hipi e oma ana me te whakaao anō.
E kīia ana ko Kupe te Māori tuatahi i tae mai ki Aotearoa nei.
Kei te turituri kau te hoihoi, kei te komekome kau mai nā ngā ngutu, kei te whakatanuku kau te korokoro, koua mate au, ī
Kaua e kaha rawa tō whakanou i te aho nā, kei motu.
Ko tēnei hononga tangata tētehi o ngā huarahi nunui o Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki ngā kāwei o runga i a Tainui
Te whare makatea, arā te whare tapu o te tohunga, te whare makamaka rākau
He whakapūwharu te koua ki ētahi tāngata.
E hārau ana te kāpō i te pūreke o te tatau.
Kei te pōkahu a Hira i tana kore e mōhio kua ahatia rā tana tokotoko.
E whaiwhairoroa ana kia mutu te kai paipa a tana hoa kua hapū nei, he aha te aha.
He maha ngā rewharewha kua pā ki te tangata i roto i ngā rau tau, i ēnei rā nei ko te mate ārai kore tētahi.
Ki a au nei, he reka ake te piki māota i te piki kua parauri, kua pūtokitoki.
Ka maringi te inu, ka huarapa kia kapi katoa te tēpu.
I te taumaha o te maitai, ka motu te taukaea i te hikitanga ki runga.
E tāngarangara ana i te kore e waia ki ana rekereke teitei.
E kore te tai e kātata mai ki ngā taipū i ngā taitai ririki.
Pēnei he kaitiaki ngā taowaru i te tatau o te whare, e pūkana ana, e whētero mai ana!
Kua whakatangitangi i tana kōauau hei wēkiki i te tau o tana ate.
Me torohē koe i te waewae o Uenuku i tū i te nēra, kia kite ai koe mēnā kua mahu haere, kua kino rānei.
He rawe te titiro ki ngā wai o te roto e māpuna kau ana i te matangi.
Ki te hīrau te matau i te rimurimu, he mahi nui ki te huti ake.
Riro ana nā tana tupuna wahine ia i whakatipu
Ehara, moe ana rāua nei, ā, tupu noa ō rāua nei uri; ā, moroki noa nei, mahara tonu rātou ki ngā whanonga a tō rātou tupuna wahine, a Te Huhuti
Ka whakatakotoria te kokoti moe roa, ka haere te torotoro ki te tō mai i te hoariri.
Pīokaokangia he peha mō tā tātou ahi
Ka riro mā ngā wai makariri o te puna e tāmata tana wairua.
Ko mātou, ko ngā tāngata kua tuhia nei ō mātou ingoa kei raro, e mea atu ana ki a koe kia whakanohoia mātou e kōrua ko te Kāwana, hei hōia mō tēnei tiriwā o Haaki Pei
Ka tango ia i tōna whītiki, me tōna maro whero
Hokona he whītiki rinena mōu, ka whītiki ai ki tōu hope
Ehara tēnei whītiki i te whītiki pongi, ko tēnei whitiki kua paiherea nei tātou he whītiki koura tēnei whītiki - e kore tēnei whītiki e motu
He nui ngā ngaru o te moana, he nui hoki te pūtai i runga e huhuka mai ana.
I kīia ai tērā kahu he kahu tāniko, i te mea he tāniko kei te tapa raro.
Hoatu he kōwhai paku nei ki te kikorangi, ka hua ko te kārikiuri.
Ka hoki mai anō ki roto o tō puku, kōnatunatu ai
Ko ahau e pōuri ana mō te poronga i a ia i waengapū o ana mahi mō te iwi Māori
Kāhore hoki he aha mehemea ki te hinga ahau i te matā. E whā ōku tēina hei tango i tōku tūranga i muri i au
Māna e pūtiki te ua o te pakanga e tauwhiro mai rā te hiku o te taua
Kāore e tino pai ō tauira - me kimi ētahi atu.
I te Rātapu tuawhā o te marama, ka haere ki te karakia, i ētahi atu Rātapu, ka toro i tana whānau.
I te roa e noho noa iho ana, kua rore. Me puta ki waho kia pūhia e te hau.
Kāore i ārikarika te pupuhi mai o te tuku uta.
Ko tōku māharahara nui, kei ngaro ērā whakapapa.
He koti atu anō tōku, engari kāore e mahana pēnei i tēnei nā.
He hou noa ake tōna waka i tōku.
Kei te maumahara tonu ia ki ngā kupu o ngā waiata koroua i ākona e ia i a ia e tamariki ana.
Kei te maumahara anō koe ki te ingoa o taua tangata? Kua wareware hoki i a au.
Kua haere rātou ki te tiki maunga hei mahi i te hāngī.
He tahakura te mea nāna i whāki ake te aroha
Nā te kaha wera mātou i waikauere ai ki te mahi.
Ka uia atu anō pēnei nō nahea i mate ai, ka kī atu nō te 8 o Hurae
Hine: I nahea tērā? Tama: I te Paraire ka taha.
He kaha tonu te haurahi i tēnei ata, tata tonu ka haupapa.
I taka ki a Hāriata te kawenga ki te hahu me te neke i ngā kōiwi tūpāpaku he wāhi kē
Ka taka ki te tau 1877 ka rīhitia te mira, engari ko te hiahia o te kairīhi ki te neke i taua mira ki Kororāreka kia kore ai e riro i te waipuke
Kia pupuhi te awanga, ka rangona te haunga o te rua para i tēnei moka o te tāone.
Nā taku pōtiki koe i tiki atu ki te tahatū o te rangi
Ko tōna tekau mā whā rā nei te kōkōtea e tāpapa ana i ā rāua hua ko te kōkōuri.
Kua roa au e wawara ana kia haere au ki Uropi, engari he nui rawa te utu.
Ka pai te kaukau hei patu i te ngenge o te tinana.
Ka mutu ngā mahi mō te rā kua haere mātou ki te kaukau, he uku tā mātou hopi.
Ka mihi te koroua ki te hē haere o te reo Māori i roto i ngā tau.
E nganangana mai rā a tama waha papā.
Kua whakaarorangi noa ake tōna ngākau ki te ātaahuatanga o Te Whatuiāpiti, te kuku o tōna manawa
Ao ake i te ata, e ponguru tonu ana tā rāua ahi, ka hoatu he maramara rākau ki runga, ka mura mai anō.
Nō te ahiahi ka kapi te wai i te tūpoupou, te aonga ake o te rā ka kitea te hanga nei e pūkai ana ki uta
Ki te haere ahau ki te taka i te wāhi mō koutou ka hoki mai anō ahau, ka tangohia koutou ki ahau
Ko ngā wāhine ki te taka kai mā mātau
Mahia ki te wāhi tūmaru, ki te wāhi kāore e whitikina ana e te rā.
Haere tonu mai te tai o te moana, ā, kati ki te pari, nā te tai i ārai te ara
Tēnei koa tāua te kīia mai nei e tō tupuna, he taunanawe riri koe
He pia te kai i te ahiahi, he kotiuru te kai i te ata ka whai ake.
Kua mamae aku taringa i te mea e tawē mai rā.
Kua kaupararī ngā toa ki te rapa i ngā mōrehu.
Ka tahuri te hoariri ki te tūkuku i te iwi, me te tūkino i ngā wāhine.
Ko taku pāpā whakaangi tēnei i moe i taku whaea i te matenga o taku pāpā tupu.
E hurihuri ana ngā ringa o te karaka.
Ko au ki raro nei ka whakaraupeka i aku mahara
Ka whakaraupeka te hinengaro āe rānei ka murua e koe taku hara ki a koe.
Ko te whakatau a te kōti e whiu ana i a ia, kia tekau tau ia ki te whareherehere mōna i tāhae ai i ngā moni a tana kamupene.
He kāri whero te whiu a te kaiwawao i a ia, he ngau nōna i te taringa o tētahi o te hoariri.
E toru meneti ki te kokonga kino te whiu i tā rāua tamaiti ki te patua e ia te kurī.
Ka motokia tōna ihu e Māui, taratī ana te toto; ka rere, ka taratī te karukaru
Oma kōtaha atu ana ngā pāpaka ki raro i ngā toka o te takutai.
Ka rere kōtaha atu te kōhatu i te mīhini tapahi pātītī, pakaru tonu atu te matapihi.
I te rongonga kua mate tana tino hoa, ka māturuturu ōna roimata.
Maringi ana ngā roimata o Toi. He roimata hari, he roimata koa
Kaupokina te hāngī ki te pēke mākū i mua i tō tāpuke ki te oneone.
Inā kē te matomato o ngā kai ka whakatupuria ki te paraumu.
Wekuweku ana te puhi waero e whakarākei ana i te taiaha.
Ko tēnā rākau he neinei, ko ōna manga ka wekuweku noa atu ki waho
Ko te hāpai ki mua, mā te mātua e whaiwhai atu.
Kia āta whakamokamoka atu, kei oho ngā pārera
I ngā wā i wātea ake ia, pārekareka rawa atu ki a ia te whakamokamoka tia, te pupuhi pārera me te whakangau poaka
He toka koropungapunga te pungapunga, koirā i māmā ai.
Kaua e hangaia te waka ki te rākau koropungapunga - ka totohu noa iho.
Ka whakahokia mai ko te āpititū, ka mate i reira he tini ki te tahua
Kua roa te ao e kapekapetau ana mō tērā tokorua - i te mutunga iho, he hāwatewate noa.
Kia tipu rawa ngā huruhuru hou o te kororā, kātahi anō ka kounu - kei mate hoki i te mātao.
Haere mai ki ahau, e koutou katoa e māuiui ana, e taimaha ana, ā, māku koutou e whakaokioki
Ahakoa moe, ahakoa ara rānei, e taimaha tonu ana te tangata i te nama
Ka kino te ngau o te makariri i te whaturua.
Takahia mai ngā takahanga waewae o ō mātua, o Te Korimako rāua ko Te Waka Maori me ērā kaumātua kua tauwehe atu rā ki te pō
Ka haramai tēnei, ka tauwehe, he hanga hua noa te roimata i aku kamo
Ko Te Ua Haumēne te kaihanga me te poropiti o te whakapono Hauhau
Kei whakarongo ki ngā kupu a ngā poropiti e poropiti nā ki a koutou
Kaua rawa koe e whakatarariki i te tamaiti he taretare ana kākahu.
He āmiki kē te mahi a tēnā - kia roa koe e whakarongo ana, kātahi anō ka mau te iho o tana kōrero.
I ēnei rā e whakaae ana te tokomaha he mahi kino te patu i te tamariki.
Ka mea ia ki te patu i te kiore ki tana tokotoko.
Kakare pai ana te wai i te pueatanga ake o te tohorā.
Ko te tāpara, ko te matanā kei te mārama, ko te whakatutuki kei te mārama, nā reira okea ururoatia!
Kua rongo mai ki te reo, ka ngunguru te koroheke nei
Ka pā te patu, ka ngunguru ake me he kumukumu
Me te kohu te rere mai o te wai i te tāheke.
Waiho ana mā te uriuri e taka i waenga i ngā hapū e rua, e whakawhitiwhiti kōrero mai i tētahi taha ki tētahi.
E kī ana te Pākehā, ahakoa te kino o te kōrero ka kawea mai e ia, kaua e pūhia te uriuri!
Ki te muru pīkari tūī e whakapīrahoraho i te pae o te kōhanga
Ko tā te pīkari whakarongo te whakarongo a te rōpū nei
He toroa awe nui e kopa ana ia ki te muri
I ngere taua tangata, i haere ki te tiki i tāna mea, ā, kīhai i whiwhi, ā hoki ngere mai ia
Ka paoa te hēki ki te naihi.
Ka ū ki uta ka paoa te rae e te kōhatu taka iho o runga i te pari
Kua pingohe te ure, kua tārewa noa iho.
He kōtaotao noa, kāore e mate taku puku, engari kia kaha ake i tērā te karekare o te wai, kua hia ruaki tonu au.
I whakatau ia me mutu tana mahi, me noho ia ki te kāinga ki te tiaki i tana pēpē.
Ko te whakatau a te Poari, kia kimihia he kaimahi hou hei āwhina i a Hare.
Kua oti kē tana tueke te pōkai, e tūkari ana a koroua ki te haere.
E toru marama te roa o te whawhai, kāore tonu tētahi taha i toa.
Me rangaranga tō waewae, kei te hiahia au ki te whakanoho i te tūru ki konā.
He mea takai ahau e koe ki roto ki tōu tikitiki
He pōkeke tonu ngā māra o ngā iwi noho tāone i aua wā, engari he nui tonu te kai i whakatupuria.
He mea waihanga te nuinga o ngā mōhiti mārena ki te koura.
I te nui o te koura i kitea ki Taranawaara ka heke mai te mano o te tangata o ētahi atu wāhi ki te mahi koura
Tangi mai te tupa ka ronarona i taku kakī
Whakaterea tō waka. Akiakina kia rite te rau o te hoe
I te tau kua taha ake nei i whakaterea e te Kāwanatanga tōna whakahoutanga o te Rautaki Reo Māori
Waiho mā te hau kikihi e whakamahea ngā whakaaro.
Whakaaroharoha ana te whakarongo atu ki ngā kuia nei, ko ētahi hoki kua eke kē ki te iwa tekau haere ai, ā, kitea atu ana te uaua ki a rātou o te tū takitahi mai ki te waiata
Ātaahua ana tērā te kitea o Te Āporo Nui i te papa whā tekau mā rua o te whare wānanga nei
Ka rakaina atu te kūaha, ka raua atu te kī ki tana pūkoro.
Kotahi huringa i te kī o te waka, ka haruru mai.
Ka hurihurihia te kī kia haere anō ai te karaka.
Ana! Ka kīia atu kia kaua e rawekehia te mea nā, auare ake.
Ka kukua te ringaringa, ka motokia ake ki tōna ihu; ka toto te ihu, ka pania ki te matau, ka whiua ki te moana; ana, rere tonu, rere tonu, ā, ka tae ki te tekoteko, mahue ake
Ka hokihoki tonu te ringa ki te mirimiri i te korakora kei roto i tana karu.
Ka eke ōna tau ki te 16, ka mahue i a Pātariki te kāinga mōriroriro nei o Pungaere ki te haere ki Tīpene
Ka miti ia i tana takonui, ka huri i te whārangi.
Ki taku kararehe ki a Te Arewhana! He kararehe pai koe, haramai ki konei torotī ai i te wai o tō ihu
He iti iho te tūpono pā o te mate pukupuku ki te kiri o te tangata kenehuru, tēnā i te kiritea.
He kongakonga pihikete noa iho e toe ana i runga i ngā pereti a ngā tamariki.
Ka riro 146,289 eka o Rēkohu i te Māori, arā, 97.3 paiheneti o te whenua; ko te kongakonga i riro i te Moriori e 4,100 eka, arā, 2.7 paiheneti noa iho
E muri koe ahiahi nei kia nohoia ake tahi hoki te aroha
Kua minamina auahi ngā pukapuka i te ahi, ūā ana nei.
Kia minamina puehu te ihu, kua tihetihe.
I kite koe i te nauhea e pati moni ana i te kokonga rā? Ka mahue tana haere ki te kimi mahi māna.
Kia ripia iho ki te rau o te pānekeneke
He mea whakatūaho te whānau kia riro ai ā rātou moni i te rāwaho.
Ka kākarauri, ka tae mātou ki te kāinga
Ko te iwi o Kahuparoro ki te koko i te aruhe, ko te iwi o Rākaihikuroa ki te āka i te pei o te aruhe
E taki ana i ngā kōrero mai o mua
Ka tākina te kawa
I konā kua tākina e te whakaminenga te Inoi a te Atua.
Pūkairia ngā oneone ki waenganui
Tuia te kawe, tairanga te kawe, ko te kawe o te haere
He whenua ukiuki, he whenua tōnui, he whenua pakanga, he whenua pakukore.
He kiri tāingo tētahi o ngā tohu o te mate mitera.
E toru ngā momo paramu i tanumia, kia kore ai e maoka katoa i te wā kotahi.
Kātahi au ka noho i konā whakaaro ai āe rānei e tika ana tā te kaikōrero, e pōkaku kē ana rānei
He pūmā te pungarehu.
Kei te warawara au ki te tītī māku, engari me ū tonu au ki ngā tohutohu whakatiki a te tākuta.
Ka whakaaratia e ngā tohunga o te reo Māori, i te wā e tū ana ahau hei upoko mō tēnei whakahaere, ko te ingoa mōku ko te Amokapua
Tērā anō te nui o ngā mau e hinga ai, e mau ai rānei te tangata, arā, te urutomo, te whiu me te wiri.
E ai ki te kōrero, ki te toua atu te tō o te rōhi ki te wai korohū, ka roa ake e ora ana i te ipu.
Ka kore tētahi kupu e mārama, kotahi atu ia ki ana papakupu.
Me tahuri ki te papakupu pūtaiao ki te kimi i te roanga atu o ngā whakamārama mō ngā kupu pērā i te 'ahotakakame'.
Kua haurangi, kua eneene riri.
Ka ngarungaru tonu te moana i te tonga tāwaha.
He arero kapetau noa, kāore i mōhio kua moe kē te hoa.
I māturuturu iho anō hoki ngā wai o ngā kapua
I a mātau e waiata ana e māturuturu ana ōna roimata
Ka tonoa te whakaminenga kia kotiti, kia wātea ai te riuroa mā tuahangata.
He tohunga te tangata rā ki te mau kapu.
Pae ana tētahi kaipuke ki waho tonu o taua wahapū, ko ngā heramana i piki ki runga ki ngā rewa, kei whiua e te ngaru ki te wai
Ko te mea kaurehe rā te mea kāore e tino whiwhi kai ana i te uwha.
Te whiti o te rore
I te rū nui ka tanuku te taiapa porokere i waenga i a mātou me te kiritata.
Kāore e motu he aha i te naihi kiporo nei.
Maiakatia kia mau ai
Ka auwhi noa te ngākau i tōna mahuetanga
Kāore ia e uru ki ngā mahi hākinakina, he tangata turikore hoki.
Kaua e pare mai tō tuarā, tahuri mai tōu aroaro.
He ātaahua ngā werewere kahurangi o te kōkako o Te Ika-a-Māui.
E whawhai kino ana tētahi ki tētahi mō ngā taonga o te tangata kua mate, kia riro i tētahi i tētahi rānei te nuinga. Kāore he mea nui atu i tēnei hei whakatupu i te mauāhara i te pakanga
Kua puta te koekoeā, wainehu ana te āhua, arā e āhua pokorehu ana
Ka whakatakotoria tā rātou tāpae ki te wāhi ururua, kia kore ai rātou e kitea e te tira haere mai i te raki.
Ka huaki te tāpae, kua kore he putanga ake mō te tira, he poupou rawa nō ngā tahataha o te kapiti.
He mea whakairo ngā māihi o tērā whare, engari anō tēnei he tōtōkau.
Kia kākahu i te kākahu whakairo
He tohu anō i te ringaringa, he whakairo, he karawaka te ingoa o taua whakairo ringaringa
Ki te kore taku au ika ka roa tonu au e kaui ana i ngā ika nei.
Ka rarā te waha o te wai kai roto i te kopia, ka ngunguru te wai
E kui, kawea atu tētahi wai mō te manuhiri
Āe mārika, e kui, te tika o ō kōrero
Kaua e tangi, e kui, kia mauri tau mai koe
Kāore i whakaaro ki te haeana i ana kākahu āmengemenge i mua i te haerenga ki te kura.
Kei hea tō mahere whenua? Māku e whakaatu atu te ara pai hei whai māu.
Kei wareware koe ki te karatiti i te koropā i mua i tō hokinga mai ki te moe.
Tapia tōu waka
Kei wareware te heri i te taea o tō waka kia tapia mai.
Me taupokipoki ngā kai kia kore ai e taea e te ngaro.
I ngā motu he pononga hei pupuri i ngā take o ngā poupou; ka tāpukea atu te poupou me te tangata
Ka whakaroau te whenua ka mōwai, auē!
Kei kī ko koutou anake i pūwhero
Kaua e waiho te pouaka pepamāro ki waho, kei haukū, ana ka parure.
Kāore i roa e whakatangi ana i tana pepe, ka tau atu he manu ki te pae, kātahi ka hāua ki te hauhau manu.
Kei reira rātou e tatari ana mō tētahi wā roa, nā wai ā ka puta ake te pahi.
I te tuatahi, ko tōna wāhi noho mō tētahi wā roa ko Te Kūiti, whai mai i muri, ka neke ki Ngāruawāhia
Ki te rapurapu koe ka kite koe i tō pēke.
I tana haerenga ki tātahi ka kite ia i tētahi manu kua whara.
Ka whakatūria e koe he kara, he pātai riri tēnā
Ka taea te tāingāwai o te ihu, tango atu ki te tāingāwai o waenga
Me paoke anō koe i te hunga hoko koti kirikau āhua māmā nei te utu.
E ngāngā ana, e puhapuha ana te poho.
He uaua te wewete i ngā pātene iti mēnā e tino makariri ana ngā ringaringa.
Kua ngaro te pātene o tana tarau, engari mā te tātua e whītiki kia kore ai e makere.
Ka mamae ō waewae ki te haere kore hū koe i runga i ngā kōhatu nā.
Kātahi ka tūtū ngārahu ngā tāngata kotahi rau e rima te kau, muri iho ka haere katoa ki te whare rūnanga
Ka tūtū atu te kapa haka, ka mahi i te peruperu, i te tūtū ngārahu rānei, te tīmatanga o ngā manaaki a te Māori i te tūārangi
Hōngoingoi tonu mai ia ki te kāinga o tōna hungawai
I reira ka kawea kia waituhitia te wahine rā
Kia kaha te kai miraka kia marohi ai ō wheua.
Me he kororipo te wai ka unuhia ana te puru o te tāpu.
Kia pakari ake ō pūmanawa whāwhā rorohiko, hei reira pea kitea ai he mahi māu i konei.
Ka whakahokia mai ko te āpititū, ka mate i reira he tini ki te tahua
He tamaiti niwha, he tere tū ngā pihi.
Ko ngā kererū e toru i kōhuatia māku, ā, i homai ki runga i taku tēpu i roto i te rīhi, hinuhinu ana te wai
Tō waka, e Kawa, hei pīhau tere kei te rimurapa
Waimarie kua kitea he kano ārai mate mō te koroputaputa, me i kore e kitea ka puta he urutā.
Kua pōuri haere anō a waho, kua heke hoki te rā, engari kei te mārama tonu mai te waha o te ana
Kapi tonu te rangi i te pōkēao. Kua pōuri kē
Horekau i roa te rironga atu mā Hōri e taraiwa, ka taka tō mātou taraka i te parenga
Kaua e taraiwa haurangi, waeahia atu he tekehī!
I te taumaha o te waewae o te taraiwa, rērere ana te kirikiri, tutū ana te kapua puehu
Ko te tangata e hiahia ana ki te kai reka, ki te hango pai, me haere mai ki a au hoko ai
Ka whakamahia e te koroua rā tana hango hei kari i tana māra kai.
Tēnā kia āta tau, kei tukoki noa tō tāua waka.
Arā a Ahitereiria, kei te uru-mā-raki o Aotearoa.
Ko te haupitonga, he hau pupuhi mai i te tonga-mā-rāwhiti.
Ina inea te tāroa haere o ngā tamariki i roto i ngā tau, ko te tāroa me te takanga o te wā ngā taurangi ka tirohia.
Kia rerekē te tere o te haere, ka rerekē anō te roa e tae atu ai - ko ēnei hanga e rua e kīia ana he taurangi.
Ki te whātuturi ngā rōpā, me wepu rātou ka tika.
Kua oti te haumi, kua piri te kākāriki o te niao, kua eke ngā oa
Ka tae tō Waikari me tōna iwi ki te ngau i taua pā, ka horo te pā
